Title: Teamavond NIX18 - 100% ID Alcohol en Tabak
Description:
Organiseer een teamavond alcohol en tabak om jouw team de wetgeving rondom aankoop van alcohol en tabak en de richtlijnen rondom legitimatieplicht te leren! Samen gaan we voor 100% ID controle!

Deze teamavond wordt in de winkel georganiseerd door Teamleider Verkoopafhandeling en eventueel ondersteund door (A)SM.

Gebruik de volgende hulpmiddelen om de teamavond voor te bereiden (klik op de blauwe paperclip hieronder):
* Handleiding Teamavond 100% ID
* Fotoboekje Teamavond 100% ID (in kleur te bestellen via de bestellijst opleidingsmaterialen op SAM)

Na de teamavond kennen de deelnemers het volgende:
- Wet- en regelgeving rondom verkoop van alcohol en tabak aan jongeren
- Richtlijnen rondom legitimatieplicht bij verkoop van alcohol en tabak aan jongeren
- Bewust van de positieve en negatieve ervaringen van caissières bij het vragen naar ID
- Weten welke oplossingen andere caissières hier zelf voor hanteren
- Zijn op de hoogte van de ondersteunende rol die het management (TL's & (A)SM's) hierbij heeft

Aanleiding voor het organiseren van deze Teamavond:
- De winkel scoort nog geen 100% bij een controle door een derde partij (bijv. audit) bij het vragen naar legitimatie aan de kassa.
- Na observatie door de Teamleider/(Assistent) Supermarktmanager is gebleken dat caissières niet naar ID vragen of dat zij de procedure omtrent kassablokkade niet correct opvolgen.

Aanmeldingsprocedure: De winkel organiseert zelf lokaal een teamavond.

Voorkennis: Caissières zijn bekend met de wetgeving en het beleid van AH rondom legitimatieplicht doordat zij de opleiding caissière (A en/of B) gevolgd hebben.

Title: Workshop Inzicht in Verkoopafhandeling en training Praktijkgericht leidinggeven
Description:
Verdieping in en aansturing van het proces verkoopafhandeling.

De workshop begint om 8.30 uur. Dit is een gecombineerde workshop/training voor teamleider verkoopafhandeling. Het ochtend deel bestaat uit verdieping op de verschillende rapportages: wat valt je op in de praktijk, met welke rapportages kun je dat verder onderzoeken en hoe combineer je informatie uit de verschillende bronnen.
In het middagdeel oefen je met gesprekken die je op de winkelvloer die je helpen het proces efficiënt aan te sturen.

Voorkennis: Voordat je kunt deelnemen moet je de verplichte onderdelen van het gebied procesaansturing verkoopafhandeling en de toetsen Voorraad op orde, Geld op orde en Kassa & Zelfscan hebben gedaan.Ook maak je de twee voorbereidingsopdrachten voor deze ochtend en middag. (zie paperclip hieronder)
Leverancier: Supermarktmanager en Moovs
Deelnemers: 8 - 12 deelnemers

De volgende onderwerpen staan centraal tijdens deze training:
- talenten herkennen en benutten

Description:
Korte introductie: In dit opleidingstraject wordt nieuwe supermarkt managers  geleerd een goed gefundeert winkelplan te maken.  Daarnaast wordt er aan de persoonlijke leiderschapsontwikkeling gewerkt, waarna de koppeling gemaaakt wordt naar de taken en verantwoordelijkheden van de SM.

Helycopterview, analyseren en korte versus langetermijn zijn aandachstpunten.

Title: Vakdiploma Drogist
Description:
In deze online cursus leer je alles wat je nodig hebt voor het behalen van het vakdiploma drogist. De opleiding bestaat uit drie modules die elk ongeveer 2 maanden duren. Elke module wordt afgesloten met een examen. Er wordt verwacht dat je elke week tussen de 8 en 10 uur besteedt aan je studie. In het informatieboekje kun je meer lezen over deze opleiding. Je vindt dit boekje op Etos Plaza.

Taal: Nederlands

Leverancier: IMKO Opleidingen

Kosten: € 1.242,45 inclusief examens.
                                
Aanmeldingsprocedure: Klik op Inhoud starten. Na goedkeuring van je manager in ELM kun je starten met de opleiding.



Het Vakdiploma Drogist vormt de basis voor de, door het ministerie van Volksgezondheid, Welzijn en Sport (VWS) verstrekte, geneesmiddelenvergunning en dus de bevoegdheid om zelfzorggeneesmiddelen te mogen verkopen.



Het niveau van deze opleiding is vergelijkbaar met MBO niveau 4, maar het is geen volledige MBO-opleiding (diploma geeft dus ook geen toegang tot een HBO-opleiding).



De opleiding tot drogist is opgesplitst in drie delen: Drogist en Zelfzorg 1, 2 & 3. De delen zijn zo opgebouwd dat het niet noodzakelijk is om ze in een bepaalde volgorde te doorlopen. De aankomend drogist bepaalt zelf met welke deel wordt gestart.

Title: Nascholing Drogist
Description:
Nascholing op het diploma Drogist heeft een wettelijke status. In de Wet op de Geneesmiddelenvoorziening (WOG) is vastgelegd dat de drogist de bevoegdheid heeft om niet-receptgeneesmiddelen af te leveren.

Het Vakdiploma Drogist vormt de basis voor de, door het ministerie van Volksgezondheid, Welzijn en Sport (VWS) verstrekte, geneesmiddelenvergunning en dus de bevoegdheid om zelfzorggeneesmiddelen te mogen verkopen.

Het niveau van deze opleiding is vergelijkbaar met MBO niveau 4, maar het is geen volledige MBO-opleiding (diploma geeft dus ook geen toegang tot een HBO-opleiding).

De opleiding tot drogist is opgesplitst in drie delen: Drogist en Zelfzorg 1, 2 & 3. De delen zijn zo opgebouwd dat het niet noodzakelijk is om ze in een bepaalde volgorde te doorlopen. De aankomend drogist bepaalt zelf met welke deel wordt gestart.

Title: Learning program Business Administration Ahold
Description:
Ontwikkel jezelf in het bedrijf.

Het BedrijfsKundig Leertraject (BKL) staat voor de kunde om te leren en te ontwikkelen in het bedrijf. Na dit leertraject van 6 maanden ben je in staat om projectmatig een organisatievraagstuk aan te pakken en op te lossen, heb je je persoonlijke effectiviteit, impact en invloed vergroot en heb je je kennis over de organisatie uitgebreid.

Meer weten? Lees dan het tabblad "Overzicht".

Voorkennis: 5 jaar werkervaring, functieschaal 12-14. Bij lagere schaal is deelname mogelijk als de kandidaat over voldoende vaardigheden beschikt (dit wordt vastgesteld in vervroegd intakegesprek).
Leverancier: Performance Consultancy
Locatie: Extern
Deelnemers: 12
Trefwoorden: projectmanagement, persoonlijke ontwikkeling
Kosten: programmakosten 2017 € 6.700, accommodatiekosten: circa € 2.750
Aanmeldprocedure: Klik op "Rooster aanvragen". Pas na goedkeuring van je leidinggevende en als de opleiding op je Leerplan zichtbaar is, sta je op de inschrijflijst. Bij voldoende aanmeldingen worden intakegesprekken gepland. Pas nadat met alle ingeschrevenen intakegesprekken zijn gevoerd wordt de definitieve groep samengesteld. Er moet voldoende spreiding zijn in functies van de deelnemers om het programma tot zijn recht te laten komen.

First Line
Description: First Line Supervisory Skills training is a leadership program for first-time supervisors that provides the tools necessary to supervise and lead successfully. This program will discuss new ways to communicate at all levels, make effective decisions, delegate tasks, and resolve conflict. In addition, compliance-related topics such as Diversity, Respect in the Workplace, and Code of Ethics will be reviewed.

Title: Trestní odpovědnost právnických osob
Description:
Co je trestní odpovědnost právnických osob a jaké dopady má na naši každodenní práci?
Školení seznamuje účastníky s oblastí, pravidly a případnými důsledky chování a jednání zaměstnanců, které není v souladu se Zákonem o trestní odpovědnosti. Je důležité vědět, čemu se vyhnout a jak se chovat při externích jednáních za společnost, ale i při dodržování interních procesů.

Title: LEAD
Description:
"LEAD offers middle-level managers the opportunity to enhance their leadership skills through lecture, discussion, interactive activities, and role-playing. It provides associates with specific managerial and leadership skills training which highlights the core values of our company.  Participants complete weekly field assignments, which are discussed during the sessions. They also work in assigned groups to develop a project based on the class objectives. These projects are then presented to their peers and supervisors on the final day of class.

Learning objectives for the course include: understand their leadership preferences, strengths and vulnerabilities, learn how to adopt a leadership style that will bring about effective performance for a specific task, communicate clearly and effectively, manage their time effectively and delegate appropriate tasks, coach effectively after appraising the importance of the particular coaching event, and problem solve with confidence by making appropriate decisions."

Title: Learning Tool Conflicthanteringsstijlen (Thomas & Kilman) (NL)
Description:
Conflicthanteringsstijlen van Thomas en Kilmann

Het gebruik maken van de meest effectieve conflicthanteringsstijl passend in een bepaalde situatie.

Wil jij weten welke voorkeur jij hebt qua stijl als het gaat om het omgaan met conflicten? Wil je de verschillende conflicthanteringsstijlen leren herkennen? Of wil jij de meest effectieve conflicthanteringsstijl kunnen toepassen tijdens een conflict? Lees dan deze tool. Hier vind je de beschrijving van de verschillende conflicthanteringsstijlen en hoe en wanneer je deze het beste kunt toepassen. Ook vind je een test waarmee je kunt achterhalen welke voorkeursstijl jij zelf hebt als het gaat om conflicten.

De methode
De manier waarop iemand met een conflict omgaat kan gericht zijn op de zorg voor de relatie of gericht op de zorg voor resultaat. Wanneer deze twee uitersten op een assenstelsel worden uitgezet, krijg je vijf stijlen van conflicthantering:
- Forceren
- Integreren
- Ontlopen
- Toegeven
- Compromis zoeken

Benodigde tijd
Voor het doorlezen van deze tool heb je ongeveer 10 minuten nodig. Het uitvoeren van de test kost ook ongeveer 10 minuten.

Title: Learning Tool Drijfveren (Graves) (NL)
Description:
Drijfveren van Graves

Ondertitel: Inzicht in de drijfveren van mensen en de impact hiervan op gedrag

Drijfveren bepalen het verschil tussen wat je denkt te kunnen en wat je werkelijk doet.

Ben jij benieuwd welke drijfveren bij jou actief zijn? Welke drijfveren er bestaan? En wat kun je met de kennis van jouw drijfveren? In deze tool lees je meer over de verschillende drijfveren en leer je hoe je rekening kunt houden met drijfveren bij veranderingen.

De methode
Drijfveren kunnen in zeven clusters worden onderverdeeld. Elke drijfveer heeft een eigen kleur en is een groepsdrijfveer of een individuele drijfveer. We onderscheiden de volgende kleuren:
- Paars
- Rood
- Blauw
- Oranje
- Groen
- Geel
- Turquoise

Benodigde tijd
Het lezen van de tool kost ongeveer 10 minuten.

Title: Learning Tool Six Step Klantverkoop model (NL)
Description:
Een model waarmee je in zes stappen effectief contact maakt met klanten en daardoor meer verkoopt.

Wil je weten welke stappen je doorloopt om effectief contact te maken met klanten? Of wat je kunt doen en zegen om meer te verkopen? Lees deze tool waarin de zes stappen van het klantcontact- en verkoopmodel uitgelegd worden, zodat jij deze toe kunt passen in de praktijk.

De methode
Het klantcontact- en verkoopmodel bestaat uit de volgende zes stappen:
Stap 1: Houding
Stap 2: Aandacht
Stap 3: Contact
Stap 4: Begrijpen
Stap 5: Verkopen
Stap 6: Verbinden

Benodigde tijd
Voor het doorlezen van deze tool heb je ongeveer 15 minuten nodig.

Title: Intraining in je kracht voor HRBP
Description:
De HRBP en In Je Kracht

In de gehele leergang voor ASM speelt de HRBP een belangrijke rol. Zo verzorgen jullie de opening van de leergang en de introductie van de deelnemers en leggen jullie in duidelijke taal de visie en uitgangspunten van Albert Heijn uit.

Daarnaast is er tijdens de module In Je Kracht een begeleiders rol weggelegd voor de HRBP. Samen met de trainer van de Boertiengroep gaan jullie gedurende twee aaneengesloten dagen de deelnemers helpen met het onderzoeken van individuele kwaliteiten en overtuigingen.

De trainer van de Boertiengroep heeft de leiding, maar samen begeleiden jullie op verschillende momenten subgroepen. Het zijn twee intensieve dagen. Zowel voor de deelnemers als voor de begeleiders. Daarom is er voor jullie een intrainingsdag georganiseerd. 

Tijdens deze dag krijgen jullie een overzicht van het programma en een intraining op de onderdelen waar jullie een belangrijke rol spelen. Ook zullen we een aantal oefeningen doen die we in de module ook met de deelnemers doen, zodat je ook zelf kan ervaren wat de doelstelling van de module In Je Kracht is.

Het is een intensieve en actieve dag waarin je inzicht krijgt hoe je deelnemers kan begeleiden in het onderzoeken ven persoonlijke kwaliteiten en overtuigingen. En dat is altijd handig.

Title: Train de trainer voor OM & HRBP
Description:
Programma Train-de-Trainer verdiepingsdag

Duur: 2 aaneengesloten dagdelen, 09.30 – 17.00 uur

Groepsgrootte: maximaal 7 deelnemers

Startniveau
Ruime ervaring met trainen. Minimaal 5 trainingen zelfstandig verzorgd. De deelnemer kent zijn/haar valkuilen. De deelnemer is in staat structuur aan te brengen in het lesplan, zorgt voor een actieve verwerking van de lesstof en is in staat aan te sluiten bij het niveau van de groep.

Intake
Schriftelijke intake aan de hand van een vragenlijst.

Voorbereidingsopdracht
Verzamel een aantal voor jou lastige trainingsmomenten/situaties. Wat gebeurt er, wat is je valkuil, wat wil je hierin bereiken?

Resultaten verdiepingsdag
Na afloop van de verdiepingsdag:
• Heeft de deelnemer inzicht in het effect van zijn/haar trainersstijl op de groep.
• Heeft de deelnemer inzicht in groepsdynamische processen.
• Is de deelnemer in staat om het groepsproces op een effectieve manier te begeleiden zodat er een veilig en effectief leerklimaat ontstaat.
• Kan de deelnemer weerstand herkennen en deze op een effectieve manier ombuigen.

Programma
09.30	Welkom, inleiding, kennismaken
10.00	Trainersstijlen en het effect op de groep. Ken jezelf.
11.00	Pauze
11.15	Groepsdynamica
Wat is het? Hoe werkt het? Wat kun je ermee als trainer? Hoe begeleidt je het proces?
12.30	Lunch
13.30	Weerstand
Hoe herken je weerstand? Wat doet het met jou als trainer? Hoe kun je de weerstand begeleiden en ombuigen?	
15.00	Eigen lastige situaties
	Intervisie of oefenen
16.00	Losse eindjes. Vragen, wensen, etc.
16.30	Hoe nu verder?
	Evalueren en afronden.
17.00	Einde

Title: Organizational Design Deepening by Hay Group
Description:
In this course you will get more in depth knowledge of Organizational Design. Subjects as Strategic Organization Design, Business & Organization Analyses, Process Analyses & Design, Processes & Responsibilities (Accountability Matrix) and Operational Organizational design will be discussed. During the training you work on an Organizational Design case. After two days of extensive knowledge obtainment and practicing skills, you are going to practice these during your work supported by Ahold OD team. After a few months we organize a afternoon to come back on all the subjects and discuss the topics and questions you encountered during real life practice of organizational design.

Target group: Target group is HRBP's who are responsible for organizational design in their department. The training can also be 'event' driven and provided when a large scale organizational change is coming up. In that case target group is HRBP's whose department is going to be affected by the change.

Pre-requisite knowledge: Workshop Organizational Design

Language: English, Dutch (depending on participants).

Type of training: In company training provided by expert consultants from Hay Group

Location: determined by what is most practical considering participants' location. Can be location (near) Zaandam or Prague.

Duration: 20 hours

Costs: between € 1.145,83 and € 1.718, 75-- per person depending on group size. These costs will be charged to the cost center of your department.

Min-max group size: 8-12 participants 

Procedure to enroll: This training is organized as in-company, when minimum number of participants have been met. Please add this training to your study plan and use the button Request schedule / Rooster aanvragen to put you on the request list. If the minimum number of participants is met, you will receive an invitation to register yourself on the planned date/time. This training can be provided on request for a specific target group of participants.

The content, delivery method and duration (ranging from 2 hours to 1 day) of the cultural awareness training can be customized to the needs and requirements of the department or team that requests the training. Depending on the request, the price ranges between € 1,650 and € 3,550.

- Communicaid: training in a virtual setting of 2, 3 or 6 hours focusing on country specific cultural challenges
Click here for more information on the two proposals.

Participants: 6 to 16

Title: Toekomstverwachtingen
Description:
Workshop 2: Toekomstverwachtingen

Workshop 2 in het mobiliteitsproject van Ahold Europe, met als thema Toekomstverwachtingen, sluit aan op de eerste workshop ´Omgaan met Veranderingen´ en het individuele Loopbaanadviesgesprek. 

Verkregen inzichten uit de eerste workshop en vooral uit het Loopbaanadviesgesprek, worden in deze workshop vertaald naar een concreet plan van aanpak, dat kan worden gebruikt voor de verdere stappen in het mobiliteitstraject. 

In deze workshop wordt op een actieve wijze ingegaan op:
• 	de betekenis van werk;
• 	waar sta ik nu?
• 	toekomstverwachtingen; korte en lange termijn belangen
• 	voorlopige doelstellingen.

Het doel is om deze workshop af te sluiten met een concreet plan voor de komende weken en maanden. Welke doelen heb je voor jezelf bepaald? Welke belangen zijn er allemaal in 't spel, waar ik rekening mee wil houden? Welke stappen zijn nodig om deze doelen te bereiken? Daarnaast wordt in kaart gebracht wat je nog nodig hebt en ook waar je nog tegenaan loopt in het concretiseren van je doelen of het zetten van stappen.

De workshop stelt je in de gelegenheid om voor jezelf te bepalen welke onderdelen van het mobiliteitsproject je wilt gebruiken om verdere stappen te zetten. Maar ook om heldere onderwerpen te bepalen voor je gesprekken met je teamlead.

*Deze workshop is alleen bedoeld voor HRservices medewerkers*

Title: Opfristraining eerste opvang en nazorg
Description:
In deze training van een halve dag wordt de kennis uit de training "Eerste opvang en nazorg" opgefrist. De training wordt gegeven door een trainer van IVP. Je verwerft inzicht in de psychische gevolgen na een ingrijpende gebeurtenis en vergaar je kennis en vaardigheden in de eerste individuele én groepsopvang van medewerkers. 
Aan het einde van de training heb je: 
- meer kennis en inzicht in wat ingrijpende gebeurtenissen zijn en welke gevolgen ze kunnen hebben 
- meer kennis en inzicht in hoe een verwerkingsproces verloopt en welke fasen en verschijnselen hierin te herkennen zijn 
- kennis van het IvP Stepped Care model 
- opvangvaardigheden geoefend, zowel

Title: Conducting Interviews for Successful Results (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Using strategies for effective interviewing will best serve both you and the candidate. You will have a very clear idea of who the applicant is, and the applicant will have a realistic understanding of the job opening and the company at large. With these interviewing strategies, you will be able to make the most informed decisions about each candidate. While preparation is undoubtedly the key to a good interview, there are many factors to consider during the interview that will contribute to a positive outcome.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs and 1.5 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Conflict Intervention (Second Edition) (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Conflict is inevitable. It can destroy and it can create. Both danger and opportunity are present in a conflict situation, but the result obtained depends on the management and resolution of the conflict. The outcome of the conflict depends on how each party responds to the negative and emotional charges of the situation, and the third party role could be critical. With skilled intervention, conflict has the potential of developing better communication, more effective solutions, and greater empathy.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Financial Basics for Non-Financial Managers (Second Edition) (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Managers must know how to interpret and understand financial information and use standard reporting tools in order to make sound fiscal planning decisions.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs, 1.5 PDUs, and 1.5 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Dynamic Business Presentations (Includes Simulation)
Description:
In business meetings, you have suffered through presentations with slides packed with too much information and distracting graphics. You've been lulled to sleep by speakers droning on in a monotone voice, and you've also found that your notes from meetings can later seem inadequate. By structuring your ideas and developing effective visual aids, you can create more powerful presentations.

This course is designed for individuals who need to present information effectively in a professional environment.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1.25 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Planning and Controlling Budgets (Includes Simulation)
Description:
In this course, you will examine the benefits of budgeting and explore a range of commonly used budgets. You will also be introduced to the process of budget preparation and control.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs, 3 PDUs, and 2 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Developing and Leading an Effective Team (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Up to this point in your career, you have been a successful employee or individual contributor, or have recently been promoted to manager. You have developed skills to be successful in your field. In this course, you will learn the practical skills you need to be an effective leader in your organization.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs, 1.5 PDUs, and 1.75 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Presenting Your Ideas Effectively (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Delivering your message to others - whether a large or small group - can be nerve-wracking. This module provides several tips and techniques to help you organize and present your ideas effectively. Appealing visual aids and other effective techniques are described to help you create a dynamic delivery style.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs, 3 PDUs, and 2 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Solving Problems Logically (Includes Simulation)
Description:
In this course, you will identify when to use group versus individual problem solving and you will learn how to use a methodical problem-solving process. You will identify scenarios where it is better for an individual to solve a problem and also identify scenarios where it is better for a group to solve a problem. You will also learn about three business trends that encourage group problem solving. In addition, you will learn how training helps in the problem-solving process, list the main steps in the problem-solving process, and identify four key problem-solving states of mind.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs, 3 PDUs, and 2 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Defining the Issue of a Problem (Includes Simulation)
Description:
In this course, you will learn how to analyze problems creatively and how to determine the real problem. You will be able to identify both analytical and creative ways to solve problems. You will identify four barriers to creative thinking as well as learn the rules and steps involved in brainstorming. In addition, you will learn about Occam's Razor and how this technique can help you identify a broad problem area, clarify a problem statement, and determine if a problem is worth solving.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs and 3 PDUs. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Managing Multigenerational Teams: Dealing with Intergenerational Problems in the Workplace (Includes Simulation)
Description:
You are leading a team whose members grew up in different eras, and your intergenerational team members have contrasting ideas and attitudes about work and their roles in the workplace that affect their work behavior and conduct. Before you can resolve problems based on generational differences, you have to understand and manage problems associated with the expectations and work styles of specific generations. Then you will be better-prepared to identify possible sources of intergenerational conflict on your team. You will have a deeper understanding of why team members from particular generations may behave in ways that could disrupt productive team performance, and you'll be able to develop effective strategies to help the whole team cooperate and collaborate.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1.25 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Setting Performance Goals and Expectations (Second Edition)
Description:
This course is intended primarily for entry-level managers, supervisors, and team leaders who need to set and communicate performance goals to employees in an effective and professional way. Goal-setting for employees is an important management responsibility. After all, if your team doesn't know where it's going, how will it know how to get there? This course will help you develop a systematic approach to setting performance goals and expectations for employees.  You'll see how to establish initial goals that relate to performance objectives and accommodate employee interests. You'll learn to review and refine your goals continuously, and how to communicate the objectives and behaviors that will help your employees succeed.  And, to ensure success, you'll learn techniques that will help you analyze performance, provide appropriate feedback, coach, and review your employees' work so that their productivity and also job satisfaction can continually improve. Good employees appreciate clear goals that enable them to achieve and excel; if you can instill this kind of goal-oriented atmosphere in your team, your management skills will be valuable in any kind of organization.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Motivating Employees (Second Edition)
Description:
This course is intended primarily for entry-level managers, supervisors, and team leaders who need to be able to motivate employees effectively. Motivation is a key factor in a leader's ability to accomplish goals. Motivation is what makes a team member want to accomplish the goal with a high level of quality, as opposed to just doing the minimum work required. This course will show you how you can motivate your team to do their best work for you and for the organization. You'll start by learning what motivation is and what it means to different individuals so that you can get the best out of each employee. Then, you'll build a motivating environment by learning motivational techniques that help establish a positive atmosphere of trust. Finally, you'll make investments that will lead to long-term results, by applying incentives and addressing underlying issues that might detract from motivation. A leader who can motivate a team to do its best will be in demand at any organization, so the skills and techniques you'll learn in this class should enhance your career as well as your team's performance.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Leading Effective Teams (Second Edition)
Description:
This course is intended primarily for entry-level managers who need to lead teams effectively. The essence of management is leadership of others. Excellent managers know how to lead their teams so that they can achieve the organization's goals productively. You will see how to make your team results-focused by establishing and measuring performance goals and managing team resources. You'll create structure for the group by defining roles and responsibilities and providing operating guidelines. And you'll build effective teamwork by promoting positive relationships, modeling good communications skills, and supporting your team members within the organization. A team leader who can get things done and make team members feel great about it is an asset to any organization, so acquiring these team leadership skills can enhance your career in any environment.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Managing the Generation Mix (Includes Simulation)
Description:
How you manage employees one person at a time, one day at a time will take more time and skill than ever before. Management today is high-maintenance work. You need to tailor your approach depending on the generation mix in your team and what they need from you. Whether you're creating flexible work arrangements for a Gen X parent who wants to telecommute, provide coaching-style feedback or just-in-time training to a Boomer, or setting goals and deadlines for a Generation Y employee, you need to understand the different generations, meet their expectations and needs, and strategize effectively to get the best performance from each person.The target students for this course are senior managers and supervisors who want to achieve better results by harnessing the unique capabilities of all the generations in the workplace today.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1.25 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Thinking Strategically
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval.  To start the process, press the "Add to Learning Plan" button, then press the "Request Approval," button, and finally press the "Submit" button. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=As business success becomes more difficult to achieve, companies are discovering the importance of strategic thinking. Being lean and mean and process efficient is no good if you don't have the correct business strategy. But what is strategic thinking and what does it look like in the context of your business? This course is focused on discovering and using the key elements of successful strategic thinking.
TargetAudience=Those in management who are engaged in or preparing for a more strategic role in their business. This includes senior executives, operation managers, consultants, and business people looking to add a more strategic edge to their business activities. 
Duration=2.0 hours

Title: Managing a Virtual Office (Second Edition)
Description:
Technology is making it possible for employees to perform the same tasks from a remote location that they could if they were on site. Leaders must learn new skills and adapt past leadership behaviors to effectively manage a virtual office.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Presentation Skills (Second Edition)
Description:
This course is intended primarily for entry-level managers who need to deliver public presentations as part of their professional responsibilities. They say most adults fear speaking in public more than anything else! Nonetheless, at one point or another in professional life, almost everyone is in a situation where they need to make a presentation to a group. Making a public presentation doesn't have to be a fearful or difficult experience. The information in this course will help you deliver a polished presentation that captivates your audience. You'll learn how to approach the presentation by creating a plan, and how to develop presentation content that is well-organized and meaningful. You'll learn simple and effective techniques for preparing the presentation so that you can express your message clearly and confidently. And finally, you'll see how to give a dynamic presentation. Speaking in public is a great way to make a good personal impression on others, as well as to represent your organization in the very best light. With the skills in this course, your presentation won't just be adequate—it will be excellent.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: OUT OF SERVICE GCTP GM/HBC Associate Course and Assessment
Description: GCTP GM/HBC Associate Course and Assessment Description

Title: Harnessing Innovation Within Teams 1: Being an Innovator (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Leading innovators and capitalizing on their creativity requires that you not only understand them as creative individuals, but that you connect with your own creativity. If you are unable to attain a creative and innovative mindset, it will be very difficult for you to align with other innovations and creative attempts on your team. You are now in charge of a team of diverse individuals, each with their own ideas and approaches to problems. The first step in harnessing those unique approaches is to understand what it means to be an innovator.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1.25 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Harnessing Innovation Within Teams 2: Generating Ideas (Includes Simulation)
Description:
While many innovations simply “happen,” you can't rely on ideas just coming when needed. Any given problem needs a solution sooner rather than later, and creative solutions require time and effort to produce. Knowing how to generate creative ideas will help you solve your problems and innovate. You understand your own creative aptitude, and have prepared yourself for innovative thinking. Now you are ready to begin the creative process of generating ideas.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1 HRCI general recertification credit. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Harnessing Innovation Within Teams 4: Managing Innovation (Includes Simulation)
Description:
In order to truly innovate, simply coming up with an idea and implementing it is not enough. Being innovative is a full-time proposition, that involves building and maintaining a workplace that encourages ongoing innovation.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1.25 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Coaching in the Workplace: Establishing a Coaching Relationship (Includes Simulation)
Description:
More and more organizations are recognizing the importance of leadership for building a high-performing organization. Workplace leadership is about influencing people to perform at their highest level in achieving the goals of the organization. Coaching is the application of workplace leadership in the area of employee development. To learn any skill fully, you need a guide. To learn how to handle a car safely, you need a driving instructor. To learn mathematics, you need a math teacher. The same goes for work. To get the most out of your work potential, a workplace coach can be invaluable. In this course, you will establish a coaching relationship.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs and 1 HRCI general recertification credit. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Coaching in the Workplace: Coaching for Performance (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Having skilled employees doesn't guarantee top performance. High performers may lack challenges and begin to coast. Average performers may shrink from taking on challenges and hide from view. A skilled manager must carefully evaluate employees' performance, note their strengths and weaknesses, and help construct development plans. But change can't be dictated. It must be embraced, and managers with coaching skills can empower employees to take risks and enlarge their skill sets. Once you establish coaching relationships, you can shape the direction of your team and create a truly dynamic team atmosphere. In this course, you will coach for performance.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs and 1.5 HRCI general recertification credits. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Coaching for Results 1: Laying the Groundwork (Includes Simulation)
Description:
As a manager or supervisor, you are responsible for aligning employee performance with business needs and organizational goals. Whether you are faced with a poor performance issue or you want to encourage positive performance, establishing a coaching relationship creates a supportive environment that helps employees reach their full potential. In this lesson, you will observe performance, practice active listening, and determine the coaching approach.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Coaching for Results 2: Working Towards Change (Includes Simulation)
Description:
The coaching relationship hinges on the employee's ability to successfully attain performance goals. The action plan is the map that leads to the employee's final goals. In this course you will initiate the coaching relationship and incorporate the action plan into the relationship. In many ways, the action plan is the most important element in the coaching relationship. It provides the employee with a clearly defined set of steps designed to meet specific performance goals. It provides the coach with a tool to monitor performance. Clearly defined steps, as well as monitoring and modifying of the steps, combine to make a successful coaching relationship.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.1 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Winning with People at Work 1: Mastering Concepts for Getting Results (Includes Simulation)
Description:
As a manager you must never expect less than the best and inspect to make sure you get it. There are some people who never seem to get less than the best and maybe it is because they adopt the best management approach and know how to put it to work.

Woodrow H. Sears in his book, The New Manager's Primer: Winning with People at Work from HRD Press, recommends an effective management practice and some crucial skills for new managers. In this course, you will get introduced to an effective management approach and learn some practical guidelines to put the management approach to practice. You will also learn some crucial skills to build an effective group.

This course is intended for managers, supervisors, and team leaders in any type of company.

Title: Raising Sensitive Issues in a Team Environment (Includes Simulation)
Description: Many things have the potential to become sensitive issues in team situations. In this course, based on the book, Raising Sensitive Issues in a Team Environment, from the acclaimed Center for Creative Leadership, you will identify and address sensitive issues in a team environment.

CourseDescription="Leaders...know how to dance the old dance. We all grew up in traditional organizations with conventional leader and role models. Now the music has changed. We don't know the new steps and there are not footprints on the floor." Peter R. Schools' words accurately reflect the challenges of leading today. You have to be able to develop a diverse team that can achieve optimum performance. You have to know how to motivate a variety of individuals. And you have to be willing to shed the old ways of thinking to make room for the new. This course will start you on that path.
TargetAudience=Supervisors, managers, and coaches
Duration=2 hours

Title: Managing Projects (Second Edition) (Includes Simulation)
Description:
The managing process involves organization and planning, the proper allocation of resources, and the promotion of a strong team effort. Successful project management leads to acceptable results that meet the customers' real needs.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs and 2 PDUs. For more information on these accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Managing Company Change (Second Edition)
Description:
This course is intended for entry-level managers who want to deal professionally and productively with the inevitable forces of change in organizational environments. Change comes to every organization, and while employees may fear and resist the unknowns associated with change, they will always embrace change for the better. As a leader, your responsibility is to manage and implement change effectively so that your organization can maintain productivity and growth during transitional times. In this course, you'll learn how to anticipate and plan for change, and techniques you can use to deal with concerns and resistance through the transition period. Finally, you'll learn to ensure a positive outcome by demonstrating vision and commitment as you monitor your team's progress through the change period.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Getting the Results Without the Authority: Completing the Project (Includes Simulation)
Description:
Although most organizations have established channels of authority and power, some company ventures require that their project leaders work outside of recognized authority. If you see a problem or issue that you want to resolve, or your manager directs you to solve a problem, and you have no formal authority, then you have to persuade others to help you or determine how to resolve the problem independently. Acquiring the skills to influence others to help you will enable you to complete your task, and you will establish mutually beneficial relationships with coworkers. You'll also build a reputation for being able to accomplish tasks that are beyond your normal job responsibilities. If you are seeking to advance your career, then being able to get results without authority will strengthen your resume.

Team Leaders, Project Managers, Project Leads, and anyone else who needs to accomplish results without having formal chain-of-command authority.

This course carries the following professional education credits: 0.2 CEUs. For more information on accreditation bodies, please visit www.elementk.com/products/certification-and-accreditation.

Title: Working with and Managing Difficult People Simulation
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=We all have worked with at least one difficult person in our careers. That person who grates our nerves, makes us cringe, and infuriates our sense of work-place ethics and decorum. They rant; they blame; they hide; they lie. It seems sometimes as if they make it their duty to make our lives miserable, but what can we do to protect ourselves from the mayhem they cause? What actions and strategies can we employ to harness their personalities and encourage their strengths? This simulation will help you practice just those skills.

You have just been appointed as Project Manager for creating your product's Version 2.0. You are taking over these duties from another manager who is being reassigned. As you will soon find out, the project is severely behind schedule and the holiday release date is threatened. Your team members represent all departments involved in the project and consequently, many different types of personalities. Your job is to get recommended solutions and prepare a presentation of those suggestions. However, just asking what they think will not be enough to compile the data you need. You must modify your tactics for each individual to ensure your success.

The simulation is based on the SkillSoft series "Working with and Managing Difficult People" and contains links to the following SkillSoft courses: comm_04_a01_bs_enus, comm_04_a02_bs_enus, comm_04_a03_bs_enus, and comm_04_a04_bs_enus.
Duration=30 minutes

Title: Effectief Communiceren in een adviesrol
Description:
In this 2-day training you learn to communicate effectively in an advising position. If you want practicle tips on questions like: how can I communicate effectively, how can I build relationships and how can I influence without hierachial power, this is the training for you.

You learn:
* to be more effective in communication and relationship building by improving your communication skills, especially on intervening on what's really going on in the conversation;
* to create a mutual agenda and win-win situationintervening
* to intervene on different intervention levels in conversations
* to have more insight in influencing styles that help you getting your advise across. 

Target group: this training is for people with an internal advise role

Title: Vendor Allowances
Description:
This module is all about Vendor Allowances, especially the importance of a quick, efficient and complete VA process. What is VA, why do we have it and what are the most important components? But also who is involved in the process. Next to some theory on VA and the VA-process, the role of a business controller is explained. VA is illustrated by some examples and experiences.

After this module you understand:
 - what a Vendor Allowance is
 - why we have Vendor Allowances
 - what the most important components of a VA are
 - who (end)responsible is for the Vendor Allowance
 - what the VA Database is in Lotus Notes
 - what the BOA route of the VA from status Draft to Archived is 
 - which disciplines influence have on the BOA route of VA
 - which lines in the P&L the Vendor Allowance impacts

Title: Customer-Focused Management
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval.  To start the process, press the "Add to Learning Plan" button, then press the "Request Approval," button, and finally press the "Submit" button. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=Sam Walton, founder of Wal-Mart, is reputed to have said, "There is only one boss – the customer. And he can fire everybody in the company – from the chairman on down – simply by spending his money somewhere else." Effective quality management processes focus on the customer. In today's global marketplace, customers have more choices than ever before. To achieve success, it is vital for enterprises to accurately identify the wants, needs, and expectations of their customers.

This course explores the relationship between the treatment of internal customers and the impact on external customers. It examines techniques used to identify and segment external customers, while anticipating customer priorities, needs, and expectations. Strategies for incorporating customer service principles are also analyzed. It is aligned with the Quality Management Division of the American Society for Quality's Certification Handbook and is designed to assist learners as part of their preparation for the ASQ Certified Manager of Quality / Organizational Excellence certification exam.
TargetAudience=Corporate directors of quality, quality managers and executives involved with quality at the organizational or departmental level within an organization, as well as quality consultants and candidates preparing to take the ASQ exam

Title: Coaching Performance
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval.  To start the process, press the "Add to Learning Plan" button, then press the "Request Approval," button, and finally press the "Submit" button. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=Barry is new at quality control. He completed three weeks of training, but he has already made two major errors that cost the firm $3000. He's obviously upset and discouraged over his shaky start. If you were Barry's supervisor, what would you do? Situations like this one can cause managers to fret and fuss and begin talking about disciplinary action. However, leaders take a different approach. A leader would take the time to coach Barry and find out what's really going on--perhaps determining that three weeks of training wasn't quite enough. Or perhaps discovering that Barry's mother died recently and he's struggling to concentrate. Or offering to find a mentor for Barry until the situation eases. Taking the time to evaluate a situation and making an action plan is part of the process of coaching for performance that you'll explore in this course. You'll learn when it's appropriate to mentor, train, counsel, or discipline an employee, and you'll be given guidelines and tips on how to perform each of these tasks in the most effective manner possible.
TargetAudience=Supervisors, managers, and coaches.
Duration=2 Hours

CourseDescription=Does this sound familiar? It's a Monday morning staff meeting. There are at least three conversations going on that have nothing to do with the agenda. Only half the staff has shown up, and someone is being very disruptive and argumentative for apparently no reason whatsoever. In other words, you are utterly frustrated. If this is indeed familiar and you'd like to make a change in your work group structure for the better, then the Successful Facilitator Simulation is for you.

The Facilitating Successfully Simulation is designed to help participants become effective facilitators and get meetings back on track. By providing learners with the opportunity to practice facilitative techniques and strategies, the simulation will challenge and strengthen those skills necessary for overcoming productivity barriers and enhancing communication. 

Chosen as a member of a two-person co-facilitation team for Renaissance Foods, Inc., which owns and operates several diverse restaurant chains, learners will organize and execute a meeting between the marketing personnel of the Eastern and Western divisions of Burger Hutch, one of Renaissance's most successful chains. The divisions, tasked with creating Burger Hutch's new seasonal promotion, historically have had little success organizing similar promotions in a timely fashion, and Renaissance management has decided to make a change.

CourseDescription=Dulce Confections is known for its innovative management style. You are a food scientist responsible for developing new, or improving existing, candy lines based on marketing specifications. Unsatisfied with simply following written specifications, you keep in close contact with the marketing managers and occasionally speak directly to focus group participants to clarify vague and subjective requests. You even interact with production engineers to ensure that the integrity of the product can be maintained when produced in large quantities. As a result of your extra effort, the products you are involved in have a high success rate, both with marketers and in the market, and you are often assigned a lead role on interdisciplinary R&D projects.

Seizing on your unique ability to blend science, understanding of consumer desires, and overall people skills, the marketing director, Michael, asks you to be a member of a new, interdisciplinary team to design a new, "luxury" candy for the mass market. This team is comprised of members from many different departments, so he decided to direct it himself with the goal of developing a product that is affordable to produce, but with a taste and presentation that justifies a higher than average retail price.
Having completed your major responsibility by developing a formula for "chocolate lace," you've recently been involved with the team only on an "as needed" basis. After six months, the project is going nowhere. Michael asks you help him out by taking on a coaching role.

Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval.  To start the process, press the "Add to Learning Plan" button, then press the "Request Approval," button, and finally press the "Submit" button. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=Obviously, one of the starting points for managing problem performance is to prevent it from becoming so. This is a general part of effective management, focusing on those aspects of the managerial task specific to preventing problem performance. This means employing an effective selection procedure that is based on an accurate identification of the job requirements, and then using the first period of employment to test out the effectiveness of the worker.

For established workers, if you want to avoid problem performance, it is essential for employees to see clearly what is expected of them. No employee can be criticized for problem performance when no one has explained to him or her the required standard of work.

But telling workers what is expected of them is not the end of the story. Performance management is an on-going process and, to be effective at it, a manager must be skilled in giving feedback, and aware of some of the common problems that most managers encounter in giving feedback.
TargetAudience=Managers, supervisors, project team leaders, and human resource professionals who need to deal with problem performance both informally and formally
Duration=2.5 hours

Title: Ahold Etický kodex
Description:
Tento e-learningový modul shrnuje globální Etický kodex Aholdu. Celý modul se zaměřuje na 5 obchodních principů tak jak jsou popsány v Etickém kodexu (řídit se zákonem, respektovat jeden druhého, dělat poctivý obchod, chránit majetek a informace spoelečnosti, vyhýbat se střetu zájmů) a poskytuje příklady a cvičení, které se vztahují k Etickému kodexu Aholdu a chování zaměstnance. Celý modul také obsahuje potvrzení, že Etický kodex byl přečten a bude dodržován.

Po dokončení tohoto modulu budete obeznámeni (i) s 5 obchodními principy tak jak jsou popsány v Etickém kodexu, (ii) s pravidly zaměstnaneckého kodexu a chování vztahující se k obchodním principům, (iii) s tím jak obchodní principy a pravidla ovlivňují a vztahují se k jednotlivým zaměstnancům.

Jazyk: Český
Délka: 35 minut
Cena: Zdarma

Klikněte na tlačítko "Spustit obsah" pro spuštění e-learningu. Ujistěte se, že pop-up oken je vypnutý pro ELM. Při potížích se spuštěním kontaktujte Help Desk.

Title: Emotions Mindsets and Coaching
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval.  To start the process, press the "Add to Learning Plan" button, then press the "Request Approval," button, and finally press the "Submit" button. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=What makes coachees receptive to your advice? What makes them willing to listen?
Much of your success depends on the mindset, moods, and emotions of the people you coach. If they are feeling negative about the coaching experience or overcome with anxiety about poor workplace performance, they are unlikely to be receptive--no matter how valuable your insight may be.
Getting in tune with your coachee's emotions is something that will take time. But you need to remotivate and reinvigorate them if you want to get results from your coaching session.
Your coachees' feelings may be dependent on their personality or emotions about the current situation they face. Are they feeling nervous, poorly motivated, or out of control? You need to read the signals correctly and respond accordingly to improve their mental states.
Of course, your own frame of mind also has an impact on the effectiveness of your coaching sessions. If you feel out of your depth or challenged by the content of the session, it's likely to affect your performance too.
Recognizing your mindset and mood and the mindset and mood of your coachees is vital. It is only by doing this that you and your coachees will enjoy positive and successful coaching relationships.
TargetAudience=This course is for anyone in an organization who has a role in improving the performance of their co-workers, keeping in mind the fact that coaching is not a top-down activity. The target audience includes not only team members, team leaders, and supervisors, but also managers and CEOs.
Duration= 2 Hours 30 Minutes

Title: Getting Results with No Authority Simulation
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval.  To start the process, press the "Add to Learning Plan" button, then press the "Request Approval," button, and finally press the "Submit" button. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=You have been hired within the last year as a design engineer at Autorad, a company that manufactures automotive components. Historically, the company specialized in custom-designed components for limited production runs. In recent years, the company has moved into more mainstream applications and must adapt to a mass-production mind-set.

Your team has been working on a new steering wheel design for months, which you discover has been sent back by manufacturing for its third round of changes. Manufacturing claims the previous design version could not be produced cost-effectively. You have had past experience in production, as well as with "design for manufacturability" (DFM) programs, which incorporated manufacturing feedback early in the design process. You realize that such a program would reduce design iterations as well as production costs across the board.

Having decided that you should be the one to lead such an effort, your challenge is to cultivate the image of a leader despite the fact the you have no authority and are the junior member of the design team. After assessing the risks of proposing a DFM program, you must use effective techniques to gain credibility, increase your influence and sell your idea in order to create change.

This simulation is based on the SkillSoft series "Obtaining Results without Authority" and is based on the following courses: comm_13_a01_bs_enus, comm_13_a03_bs_enus, comm_13_a04_bs_enus, comm_13_a05_bs_enus, and comm_13_a06_bs_enus.

Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval. CourseDescription=Lily Tomlin said, "I always wondered why somebody doesn't do something about that. Then I realized I was somebody." Tomlin could have been speaking on behalf of many employees in the corporate world who, despite having little authority, take it upon themselves to become leaders nonetheless. Becoming a leader, and getting results, without authority is especially important in today's corporate culture, where middle management and the concept of seniority are being replaced by a flat organization structure and intense competition. Such an environment makes the need for leadership skills especially crucial. In this course, you'll learn how to circumvent your lack of authority to get results through effective leadership.
TargetAudience=Anyone without the direct authority to achieve the results he desires.

Title: Dale Carnegie High Impact Presentation
Description:
Whether you are persuading colleagues, selling a client or energizing a team, the power of your presentation makes the difference between success and failure. The experience in this presentations skills training seminar is as close as you can get to having a personal, public speaking coach. You present at least seven times over the course of two days. Your presentations are videotaped and evaluated. And you get expert one-on-one coaching at the end of each presentation. High-Impact Presentations will benefit managers who have some prior public speaking experience. It is particularly useful for executives who speak in front of groups and sales people. This is a more advanced presentations skills training seminar and is not recommended for those new to public speaking.

Title: Praxe v prodejně a distribučním centru
Description:
Praxe v prodejně a distribučním centru (DC) je určena pro všechny nové a stávající zaměstnance centrály a distribučních center. Praxí prochází každý nový zaměstnanec v rámci své zkušební doby.

Praxe trvá 5 dní - první den strávíte na DC a zbylé 4 dny v prodejně Chodov.

Program praxe v DC: organizační struktura, doplnění, obchod služby, zboží flow, čerstvý nebo suchý sklad...
Program praxe v prodejně: seznámení s prodejnou, stínování managera prodejny a vedoucího dne, ½ dne DRY, NON FOOD, 1 den OZ + 1 dny Deli + 1 den Pečivo.

První den se dostavte na centrálu DC v 8:15, kde si vás vyzvedne kompetentní osoba.
Druhý den se dostavte na vámi vybranou prodejnu v 8:45. Na další dny si domluvíte směny s manažerem prodejny.

Prosíme o dochvilnost dle výše zaslaného začátku této praxe.
Co s sebou?
- zdravotní průkaz
- teplejší oblečení, tmavé kalhoty (ne džíny), pevnou obuv

Po absolvování praxe Vám bude přiřazen do Plánu výuky v ELM dotazník na zpětnou vazbu z praxe. Vyplňte jej prosím nejdéle do 7 kalendářních dnů. Tímto je Vaše praxe ukončena.

 

 

 

Klíčová slova:

praxe v distribučním centru, praxe na prodejně

Title: Launching Successful Virtual and On-site Teams
Description:
**Taking this course may result in a financial expense and therefore requires approval. If there are any questions, a training department representative will contact you.  An e-mail communication will be sent to you when the course has been approved.

CourseDescription=One factor that defines team success is the way in which a team is launched. Quickly moving an on-site or a virtual team into high-performance mode takes planning, strategizing, and a seamless launch. In this course, you'll learn techniques for setting up a successful team that can be applied to an on-site or a virtual environment. First, you'll learn strategies for selecting high-performing team members. Next, you will gain the knowledge and skills for setting goals and establishing ground rules. Finally, you will learn approaches for building a cohesive team culture through participation. By applying the techniques and strategies taught in this course, you will lay the foundation for successful on-site and virtual teams.
TargetAudience=Managers, team leaders, supervisors, directors, and group leaders
Duration=3.0 hours

This workshop suplies you with the relevant knowledge to implement the new Performance management cycle within your department. The workshop covers the 'need to know' subjects about Performance Management within Ahold Europe.

You can carry out yearly Ahold cycle and understand the roles and responsibilities in this process. You can coordinate and guide your own MT through the cycle-steps and quarterly managers meetings. CourseDescription=In today's market, customer satisfaction is imperative to a company's success. As customers become more savvy, they're finding that they have more options and resources of information. Companies are now competing for customers, not just locally, but globally. To make themselves stand out from the crowd, organizations have adopted customer-driven process improvements as standard procedure for raising customer satisfaction and loyalty.

You have been charged with heading up a task force to improve customer satisfaction and halt the recent rapid decline in sales of the product Final Finance. To do this, you must go through the lengthy and detailed process that has been outlined in the courses, OPER0121, OPER0122, and OPER0123.

CourseDescription=Before a Six Sigma® project can be executed, organizational strategic planning goals and objectives must be defined. Determining selection of appropriate projects and choosing an effective improvement model are crucial tasks that help to ensure your company is pointed in the right direction. Title: OUT OF SERVICE Ahold Competency Awareness VP
Description:
30 minutes

Introduction of Ahold Values and Competencies for Ahold Executives.

Our strategy tells us where we are going, our core values tell us what we stand for, and our core capabilities tell us what we need to be good at to make a difference. Our strategy, core values, and core capabilities are crucially interdependent and drive our actions, decisions and communication with each other and our customers. To ensure that we act accordingly, we have developed a set of competencies that describe the behaviors we need in our organization.

A competency is a personal quality, visible and measurable in behavior, which is a qualifi cation for excellent performance. Competencies tell us what behavior supports realizing our strategy and living according to our core values.

CourseDescription=Everyday business activities require a determined effort to fulfill. Schedules must be kept; deadlines must be met. To ensure productivity remains on target, business professionals must possess refined skills in setting priorities, managing daily tasks, and maintaining personal accountability.

The Doing Business Professionally Simulation is designed to enable participants to develop the skills necessary for increasing personal accountability and business professionalism. Over the course of the simulation, participants will practice personal development skills, encompassing the objectives of taking initiative, collaborating on goals, aligning priorities and goals, demonstrating a positive attitude, reacting positively to criticism and feedback, and being assertive.

The Doing Business Professionally Simulation comprises two scenarios and is based on the SkillSoft series "Doing Business Professionally." Throughout the simulation, links are provided to the following SkillSoft courses: pd_05_a02_bs_enus, pd_05_a03_bs_enus, and pd_05_a04_bs_enus.

Title: Online training Adviesvaardigheden
Description:
In deze online training leer je vaardigheden om jouw expertise te vertalen naar adviezen die door jouw (interne) klant worden gekocht. Je leert via internet, oefent met de leerstof via een webcam en je kunt je opgenomen video insturen aan een coach die je feedback geeft.

Je bent een specialist die inhoudelijk goed beslagen ten ijs komt. Maar je rol breidt zich uit. Je bent niet meer alleen een goede professional maar wordt ook uitgedaagd in de rol van adviseur. In de Markable training Adviesvaardigheden oefen je met alle fasen van een adviesproces, van intake tot afronding. Verder is er veel aandacht voor scherpte in je communicatie en de interactie tussen jou en jouw samenwerkingspartners en (interne) klanten.

Doelgroep: Voor alle personen die binnen hun functie te maken hebben met het adviseren van anderen

Kosten: zie site van de leverancier 
Taal: Nederlands
Wat heb je nodig: computer, geluidskaart, webcam en internetverbinding
Zoektermen: advies, consulteren, overtuigen, beïnvloeden

Procedure van inschrijving: inschrijving moet bij leverancier zelf worden gedaan (zie www.markable.nl/ahold). Zorg ervoor dat de leverancier de juiste factuurgegevens ontvangt, zoals kostenplaats en factuuradres. Zie hiervoor het handboek Accounting Plaza of vraag je leidinggevende.

Title: Opleidingsprogramma Bezorger

Bezorgen met een glimlach, je moet het maar kunnen!

De juiste bestelling afleveren binnen het juiste tijdvak op de juiste plek en dat alles altijd vrolijk en opgewekt, dat kan niet iedereen. Jij gaat deze uitdaging en wij gaan jou daarbij helpen.

Title: Online training Communiceren met gevoel
Description:
In deze online training leer je vaardigheden om gevoelens en emoties te zien en te gebruiken om je doel te bereiken. Je leert via internet, oefent met de leerstof via een webcam en je kunt je opgenomen video insturen aan een coach die je feedback geeft.

Hoe inhoudelijk gesprekken ook zijn, er spelen altijd gevoelens en emoties een rol, soms op de voorgrond soms op de achtergrond. Mensen zitten wel of niet goed in hun vel. Zijn enthousiast of ongemotiveerd, euforisch, boos, teleurgesteld. Ogenschijnlijk doet dat niet ter zake maar de effecten van het (on)handig omgaan met gevoelens kunnen behoorlijk zakelijk uitpakken. Het zien, expliciet maken en tactisch gebruiken van jouw eigen en andermans gevoelens en emoties, kan een enorme aanvulling zijn op je communicatieve repertoire.

Doelgroep: Voor alle personen die inhoudelijk sterk zijn en op procesniveau beter willen worden

Voordat een rit kan vertrekken moet er het nodige gebeuren. Alle formulieren moeten in orde zijn en natuurlijk staan de juiste bestellingen in de auto. Met deze opleidingshulpmiddelen helpen we je de juiste taken uit te voeren en acties te ondernemen.

Je kent je voorraad en kwaliteit van de aanwezige goederen!.

Informatie over en toetsing van de belangrijkste taken die je nodig hebt om deze functie goed te kunnen uitvoeren.

Title: Online training Functionerings- en beoordelingsgesprekken
Description:
In deze online training leer je om op een professionele en eigentijdse manier functionerings- en beoordelingsgesprekken te voeren en performance te managen. Je leert via internet, oefent met de leerstof via een webcam en je kunt je opgenomen video insturen aan een coach die je feedback geeft. 

Het voeren van functionerings- en beoordelingsgsgesprekken is voor veel (aankomend) leidinggevenden en soms ook voor HR professionals één van de periodiek terugkerende uitdagingen. Vragen gaan over: welke thema’s, (meet)systemen, structuren en verhoudingen spelen een rol, met welke gedragingen heb ik rekening te houden en vooral ook: waar doen we het eigenlijk voor en hoe stel ik mezelf goed op? Je traint het efficiënt en scherp sturen op waar je naar toe wilt, objectief beoordelen, actief luisteren, passend feedback geven, omgaan met emoties en weerstand, van praten komen tot actie (inclusief verslaglegging). 

Doelgroep: Voor alle personen met leidinggevende taken
Benodigde kennis: algemene communicatievaardigheden
Leverancier: Markable (www.markable.nl/ahold)
Tijdsduur: zie site van de leverancier
Kosten: zie site van de leverancier 
Taal: Nederlands
Wat heb je nodig: computer, geluidskaart, webcam en internetverbinding
Zoektermen: performance, beoordeling, functioneren, promotie, demotie, ontwikkeling

Procedure van inschrijving: inschrijving moet bij leverancier zelf worden gedaan (zie www.markable.nl/ahold). Zorg ervoor dat de leverancier de juiste factuurgegevens ontvangt, zoals kostenplaats en factuuradres. Zie hiervoor het handboek Accounting Plaza of vraag je leidinggevende.

Title: Online training Persoonlijke profilering in het werk
Description:
In deze online training leer je vaardigheden om jezelf nog beter te presenteren en te profileren, je werkt aan je impact. Je leert via internet, oefent met de leerstof via een webcam en je kunt je opgenomen video insturen aan een coach die je feedback geeft.

Door jezelf krachtig neer te zetten, zonder daarbij te vervallen in geforceerde borstklopperij, vergroot je jouw geloofwaardigheid en de acceptatie van jouw boodschap.Je leert bewust invloed uit te oefenen op je uitstraling door de gerichte coaching van jouw leercoach. Je leert wat er nodig is om jouw boodschap in verschillende situaties ontspannen, helder en overtuigend neer te zetten en gaat hier uitgebreid mee oefenen.

Doelgroep: Voor alle personen die met enige regelmaat in overleg en presentaties het woord voeren
Benodigde kennis: algemene communicatievaardigheden
Leverancier: Markable (www.markable.nl/ahold)
Tijdsduur: zie site van de leverancier
Kosten: zie site van de leverancier 
Taal: Nederlands
Wat heb je nodig: computer, geluidskaart, webcam en internetverbinding
Zoektermen: presentatie, profilering, personal branding, impact

Procedure van inschrijving: inschrijving moet bij leverancier zelf worden gedaan (zie www.markable.nl/ahold). Zorg ervoor dat de leverancier de juiste factuurgegevens ontvangt, zoals kostenplaats en factuuradres. Zie hiervoor het handboek Accounting Plaza of vraag je leidinggevende.

Title: Online training professionele selectiegesprekken
Description:
In deze online training leer je hoe je op een professionele manier een selectiegesprek voert. Je leert via internet, oefent met de leerstof via een webcam en je kunt je opgenomen video insturen aan een coach die je feedback geeft.

In deze training leer je dat voor een betrouwbare voorspelling een CV en je intuïtie meestal niet genoeg zijn. Het komt er op aan om op basis van een goed profiel en passende interviewtechniek, een goede inschatting te maken. Uiteraard zonder afbreuk te doen aan de sfeer en binnen de professionele kaders van tijd, structuur en vertrouwelijkheid.

Doelgroep: Voor alle personen die betrokken zijn het selecteren van personeel.
Benodigde kennis: algemene communicatievaardigheden
Leverancier: Markable (www.markable.nl/ahold)
Tijdsduur: zie site van de leverancier
Kosten: zie site van de leverancier 
Taal: Nederlands
Wat heb je nodig: computer, geluidskaart, webcam en internetverbinding
Zoektermen: selectie, sollicitatie, sollicitatiegesprekken, 

Procedure van inschrijving: inschrijving moet bij leverancier zelf worden gedaan (zie www.markable.nl/ahold). Zorg ervoor dat de leverancier de juiste factuurgegevens ontvangt, zoals kostenplaats en factuuradres. Zie hiervoor het handboek Accounting Plaza of vraag je leidinggevende.

Title: Online training Slecht nieuwsgesprekken
Description:
In deze online training leer je om boodschappen die voor een ander vervelend zijn, op een effectieve manier te brengen.  Je leert via internet, oefent met de leerstof via een webcam en je kunt je opgenomen video insturen aan een coach die je feedback geeft. 

Slecht nieuws is soms onontkoombaar en het moeten vertellen is dat ook. Ook al komt een bericht onverwacht, de impact van kan enorm zijn en emotionele reacties kunnen je een machteloos gevoel geven. 
In deze training krijg je voorbeelden te zien, tekstsuggesties te lezen en uiteraard ook allerlei werksituaties voorgeschoteld. Je gaat herkennen waar je eigen vrees zit (emoties van de ander, je eigen compassie, weerstand?) en ontwikkelt tekst en toon om zakelijk en sociaal te zijn.

Doelgroep: Voor alle personen met leidinggevende taken
Benodigde kennis: algemene communicatievaardigheden

Title: Training resultaatgerichte-werving-en-selectiegesprekken voeren
Description:
U kunt scherper en concreter definiëren welk type kandidaat het beste bij uw team of organisatie past. U geeft uw eisen en wensen aan en weet hoe u criteria kunt vertalen naar concreet gedrag. In uw gesprekken kunt u ervaringsgericht interviewen. U voert werving- en selectiegesprekken met resultaat!

De training wordt verzorgd door Boertiengroep. De complete cursusinhoud en informatie over data, locatie en kosten van deze training vind je op de website van het trainingsbureau (kopieer de link in je browser) 
http://www.boertiengroep.nl/training/trainingen/BRWSG/2012/resultaatgerichte-werving-en-selectiegesprekken.html
