Klíčová slova : SuccessFactors, faktor úspěchu, úspěch, řízení výkonu, řízení potenciálu, PM, hodnocení, pololetní hodnocení, roční hodnocení, rychlí pomocníci, hodnotící rozhovor.

Title: Learning Tool Omgaan met afwijkend gedrag (NL)
Description:
Het model omgaan met afwijkend gedrag maakt zichtbaar op welke manier je professioneel kunt reageren op afwijkend gedrag.

Wat is afwijkend gedrag? Welke gedragsneigingen kun je hebben als reactie op afwijkend gedrag? Op welke manier reageer je op afwijkend gedrag? Hoe moet je professioneel reageren op afwijkend gedrag?

Om antwoord te krijgen op deze vragen kun je deze tool lezen. Hierin wordt uitgelegd op welke manier je het beste kunt omgaan met afwijkend gedrag van klanten.

De methode
Het model omgaan met afwijkend gedrag geeft een indruk hoe afwijkend gedrag invloed heeft op je emoties en op je lichaam. Dit heeft dus ook invloed op jou reactie. Professioneel handelen wordt in dit model behaald door middel van:
 Zelfcontrole
 Goede inschatting van de situatie
 Neutrale houding

Door middel van deze methode wordt inzichtelijk hoe je uiteindelijk tot deze professionele reactie kunt komen.

Benodigde tijd
Het doorlezen van deze tool kost ongeveer 15 minuten.

Title: Learning Tool Omgaan met Agressie (NL)
Description:
Probeer de verschillende soorten agressie te herkennen en professioneel te reageren.

Welk verschillende soorten agressief gedrag kun je onderscheiden? Wat zijn de verschillen? En waar moet ik op letten, wil ik een adequate en professionele reactie geven op het gedrag? Als het dan toch gebeurt, wie kan je opvangen en wat houdt de nazorg voor jou dan in?

Om antwoord te krijgen op deze vragen kun je deze tool lezen. Hierin wordt uitgelegd welke verschillende soort agressie je kunt herkennen en welke reactie je daarop kunt geven.

De methode
Agressie kan op drie verschillende vormen tot uiting komen. Deze verschillende vormen hebben een andere oorzaak en vragen elk om een andere reactie. Het is verstandig om eerst goed in te schatten met welke agressiesoort je te maken hebt, voordat je een reactie geeft. De verschillende soorten agressie zijn:
 Frustratie agressie
 Instrumentele agressie
 Onvoorspelbare agressie

Benodigde tijd
Het doorlezen van deze tool kost ongeveer 10 minuten.

Title: Learning Tool Ongewenste omgangsvormen (NL)
Description:
Probeer de verschillende soorten ongewenste omgangsvormen te herkennen en als het je overkomt actie te ondernemen.

Welk verschillende soorten ongewenste omgangsvormen zijn er? Wat zijn de kenmerken ervan? Welke acties kun je zelf ondernemen? Wie kan je daarbij helpen? Hoe kun je het probleem in jouw werkomgeving aanpakken?

Om antwoord te krijgen op deze vragen kun je deze tool lezen. Hierin wordt uitgelegd welke verschillende ongewenste omgangsvormen er zijn en wat je daartegen kan doen mocht het jou of jouw collega overkomen.

De methode
Er zijn verschillende ongewenste omgangsvormen. Deze verschillende vormen hebben elk hun eigen kenmerken. Het is verstandig om eerst zelf actie te ondernemen en een duidelijke een grens te stellen mocht je met ongewenste omgangsvormen in aanraking komen. Mocht dit niet helpen dan kun je altijd op verschillende manieren hulp inschakelen.

Benodigde tijd
Het doorlezen van deze tool kost ongeveer 10 minuten.

Title: Learning Tool Overvalpreventie (NL)
Description:
Probeer de kans op een overval zo veel mogelijk te verkleinen en als het dan toch gebeurt te handelen volgens RAAK-principe.

Wat kun je doen om de kans op een overval te verkleinen? Waar moet ik op letten? En als het dan toch gebeurt, hoe moet je dan handelen tijdens een overval? Welke dingen kun je op dat moment beter wel of niet doen?

Om antwoord te krijgen op deze vragen kun je deze tool lezen. Hierin wordt uitgelegd wat de preventieve maatregelen zijn tegen een overval en wat het RAAK-principe inhoudt mocht het dan toch gebeuren.

De methode
Het handelen volgens het RAAK-principe zorgt voor een houvast tijdens de overval. De situatie is hectisch. De overvaller wil zo snel mogelijk geld of goederen en verwacht dan ook medewerking. RAAK staat voor
 Rustig blijven
 Acceptatie
 Afgeven
 Kijken

Benodigde tijd
Het doorlezen van deze tool kost ongeveer 10 minuten. De oefening kost ongeveer 15 minuten.

Title: Learning Tool Voorkomen en Omgaan met winkeldiefstal (NL)
Description:
Probeer de kans op diefstal zoveel mogelijk te verkleinen door gedragsmaatregelen.

Welke maatregelen kunnen helpen bij het verminderen van de kans op winkeldiefstal? Hoe kan ik verdacht gedrag herkennen? Wat kan ik zelf doen om verdacht gedrag te signaleren? Hoe spreek ik een winkeldief aan? En welke mogelijkheden zijn er om een winkeldief aan te spreken?

Om antwoord te krijgen op deze vragen kun je deze tool lezen. Hierin wordt uitgelegd welke mogelijkheden er zijn om de kans op een winkeldiefstal zoveel mogelijk te verkleinen.

De methode
Aanpreken en aanhouden van een winkeldief kan op verschillende manieren. Je kan dit preventief doen door de persoon voor of na de kassa aan te spreken en te wijzen op wat je hebt gezien. Maar je kan dit ook repressief doen door na het passeren van de kassa de persoon aan te houden. Waarop je deze keuze baseert en hoe je dit het beste kunt doen vind je in deze methode.

Benodigde tijd
Het doorlezen van deze tool kost ongeveer 15 minuten.

Title: Standaardpakket Coaching
Description:
Dit standaardpakket coaching bestaat uit 3 coachingsgesprekken van 1,5-2 uur, verspreid over een periode van 2 tot 3 maanden. Je formuleert je coachvraag en maakt zelf een keuze uit het landelijke bestand van senior coaches. Indien gewenst kun je eerst telefonisch contact opnemen met een coach voor een korte telefonische intake. De coachingsgesprekken zijn persoonlijk en op locatie bij de coach.
Indien blijkt dat er meer dan drie gesprekken nodig zijn, dan kun je je via ELM aanmelden voor een Aanvullend pakket coaching (1, 2 of 3 gesprekken).

Meer informatie coachportal en coaches
Vooraf rondkijken in de coachportal kan met het speciaal daarvoor aangemaakte demoaccount. Ga naar www.onzecoach.nl en log in met demoahold@onzecoach.nl en wachtwoord ocahold123.

Taal: Nederlands
Leverancier: OnzeCoach.nl
Kosten: € 1095

Aanmeldingsprocedure:
STAP 1: AANMELDEN ELM

1. Klik op "Toewijzen aan mezelf".
2. Klik daarna op "Aanvraaggoedkeuring" en "verzenden".
3. Je leidinggevende ontvangt een email met het verzoek om jouw aanvraag goed te keuren.
4. Je leidinggevende logt in in ELM en geeft goedkeuring.
5. Je ontvangt een mailbericht dat je aanvraag is goedgekeurd.
6. Log in in ELM en ga via jouw "onderwijsopdrachten" of "taken" naar het standaardpakket coaching.
7. Klik op "Cursus starten'.

STAP 2: INSCHRIJVEN ONZECOACH

8. Via "Cursus starten" in ELM kom je bij het inschrijfformulier van OnzeCoach.
Zorg ervoor dat je in dit formulier de juiste factuurgegevens vermeldt (factuuradres en kostenplaats van je eigen afdeling NL…-475001- …). Deze gegevens zijn bekend bij je leidinggevende. Je vult ook de gegevens van je leidinggevende in.
9. Je leidinggevende ontvangt een mail van OnzeCoach om input in te dienen voor het coachtraject.
10. Nadat je leidinggevende de input heeft ingevoerd, ontvang je jouw gesprekstegoed. Je kunt nu gesprekken inboeken bij de coach van jouw keuze.

Trefwoorden: coach, externe coach, coaching, coachlijst, coachpool, coaches, coachpoul, coachpoule, coachgesprek, coachgesprekken, coachingsgesprekken, coachingsgesprek, standaardpakket coaching, basispakket

Description:

If you are being coached for the first time or if your coach question is completely new, you should subscribe to the standard package (3 coaching sessions). There are also additional packages available for 1 and 3 additional coaching sessions.

Language: Dutch

Supplier: OnzeCoach.nl

Costs: € 730

Procedures to enroll: After permission of your manager in ELM, you can click on the button Start Course. This directs you to the subscription form at the OnzeCoach website. Make sure to provide the correct details for the invoice to the supplier (billing address and cost centre of your department NL…-475001- …). Your manager has these details for you. After filling out your details, you will have a credit for 2 coaching sessions added to your account at OnzeCoach.nl.

Keywords: external coach coaching coachlist additional package

Title: Correcting Performance Problems: Identifying Performance Problems
Description:
In Correcting Performance Problems: Identifying Performance Problems, you will learn the different types of performance problems and how they affect an organization. You will also learn how to determine the severity of a performance problem, how to identify causes of performance problems, and how to approach employees who have performance problems. In addition, you will learn guidelines to follow when you meet with employees who have performance problems.

(2 Hours)

Title: Umění vyjednávat
Description:
Introduction: Do you negotiate at work and the outcome is not always to your liking? If so, this course is designed for you. In this training you will learn about the basics of negotiation, the importance of preparation, tactics and techniques and more, plus you will practice most of it; because the training is practically oriented and uses interactive teaching methods (case studies, negotiation situations simulations, modeling the optimal course of negotiation, negotiation games and video-feedback).
Objectives: To learn the participants to turn a professionally mastered process of negotiation into a competitive advantage, To give participants tools to defend against tactics and tricks of hard positional negotiation, To enable participants to get acquainted with win-win strategy (principled) negotiations, To increase the confidence of participants in leading of important negotiations, Practical experience from the training will allow participants to react properly in a real situation, and will help them quickly select appropriate strategies and tactics
Target Group: Employees both in managerial and non-managerial positions who need to gain knowledge and skills in the fundamentals of negotiation (with internal and external partners); the training is not primarily intended for commercial positions (Category Managers, Merchandising Assistants, etc.).
Main Topics: When to negotiate, Sources of negotiator’s strengths, The best alternative to a negotiated agreement (BATNA), Negotiation as a process, Double value of concessions, Negotiation space, Techniques of effective persuasion and effective argumentation tools in negotiations
Framing the proposals, Tactics of positional bargaining (salami approach, competence principle, the principle of association, halving the difference, tightening screws, fait accompli, dead fish) and effective defense
Cooperative negotiation strategy - win / win, Professional preparation for negotiations
Supplier: External training agency Interquality
Costs:  According to the number of participants. These costs will be charged on your department cost center; even when you are not attending the course - based on a late apology (14 days and less before the date of the training).
Keywords: negotiation, negotiation skills, impact and influence, BATNA, efficient persuading, positional negotiation, cooperative negotiation, win-win strategy, win-win

Title: Correcting Performance Problems: Addressing Performance Problems
Description:
In Correcting Performance Problems: Addressing Performance Problems, you will learn a process for conducting effective feedback sessions with employees who have a performance problems. You will also learn guidelines for explaining to employees the impact of their problem behavior. In addition, you will learn the correct way to address negative employee responses, as well as how to respond when to employee reactions such as denial, excuses, and shifting blame.

(2 Hours)

Description:
In this workshop you will learn the specific things that you can encounter as responsible person for Management process in an Albert Heijn store in your daily practice. The workshop is part of a series of knowledge workshops for a successful operation of an Albert Heijn store.

Pre-requisite knowledge: Albert Heijn store process Management (induction)

Location: Ahold Location

Description: Deze training is bedoeld om inzicht te geven in de verschillende mogelijke manieren van leidinggeven. Je leert vaardigheden om de verschillende manieren van leidinggeven te kunnen toepassen tijdens jouw werk, je wordt bewust van je eigen (on)mogelijkheden op het gebied van leidinggeven en krijgt middelen die je kunt inzetten tijdens je werk.

Title: Adviserend verkopen
Description:
Deze training is bedoeld om de deelnemer bewust te maken en vaardigheden te ontwikkelen op het gebied van adviserend verkopen en dit te kunnen toepassen in de praktijk. 

Ter voorbereiding lesstof ontvangt de cursist een voorbereidingsopdracht:
- lesstof doorlezen
- uitvoeren opdracht winkelbezoek
- opdracht OPK ontwikkeling van eigen winkel

Title: Communicatie voor winkelmanagers
Description: Deze module leert de cursist welke communicatietechnieken er zijn en hoe deze toe te passen in de praktijk.

Title: Western Union AMLCP Refresher Training Cash Office Q3
Description: Upon completion of this course, you should be able to: identify daily responsibilities of the Cash Office Lead as they relate to Western Union; identify weekly responsibilities of the Cash Office Lead and Store Manager as they relate to Western Union; and recall how the Cash Office Lead protects customers and the store from potential scams.

Title: Correcting Performance Problems: Disciplining Employees
Description:
In Correcting Performance Problems: Disciplining Employees, you will learn guidelines for conducting an effective disciplinary meeting and how to determine whether you have sufficient cause and evidence to discipline an employee. You will also learn how to prepare for disciplinary action and how to determine whether you need a witness present for a disciplinary meeting. In addition, you will learn the proper way to document and use information about an employee's performance, as well as steps to follow when conducting a follow-up meeting with an employee.

(2 Hours)

Title: Formule team training
Description:
Deze training leert het winkelteam inzicht geven in elkaars kwaliteiten. Bespreken en bewust maken van de mogelijkheden van het team en de verbeterpunten om samen met je team de beste drogist te worden.
Uitleg en inzicht bieden in missie, visie en positionering van Etos en het de Etos Winkelformule: het 4 werelden concept

Resultaat van deze training:
(H)erkennen van ieders kwaliteit en afspraken hoe verbeterpunten worden gerealiseerd met betrekking tot de samenwerking onderling.
Voordelen en (on)mogelijkheden kennen van de Etos winkelformule.

Title: Persoonlijk leiderschap
Description: In deze training is de aandacht gericht op het persoonlijke leiderschap, met als doel om via het verkregen inzicht zelfbewuster, zelfverzekerder en effectiever leiding te kunnen geven aan het team.

Title: Competentiegericht beoordelen
Description:
De cursist leert wat competenties zijn en hoe die getoetsd kan worden door te observeren en hoe met deze kenmerken te werken. De cursist wordt bewust van zijn eigen filters bij het waarderen van de observaties. Dit om te gebruiken bij de verschillende gesprekken, zoals voortgangsgesprekken, selectie, beoordelen en coachen. 

De training gaat in op het belang van beoordelen vanuit Etos, vanuit leidinggevende en vanuit de medewerker zelf.

Title: Plateau 5 Web Based Training - Learner
Description: Introduction to Plateau's Interface - Version 5.  Plateau is the software behind the Learning Source portal.

Title: Western Union AMLCP Cash Office refresher 2012 QTR3
Description: This course is designed for Cash Office Associates. The purpose of this course is to ensure compliance with the US Patriot Act which includes any money transfers and money order sales and also to maintain a common training program amongst the Divisions. Any violations of this program could subject our company and associates to severe criminal and civil penalties and could seriously damage the good name of our stores and company.

Title: YES: Your Effective Strategy
Description:
This 2 x 3 day personal effectiveness programme is focused the questions: Who am I? How am I perceived? What do I want to achieve and how can I achieve this? Module 1 consists among other elements of a game, a 360 analysis, value management test, and personal coaching. After the first module, the participants do an assignment which will be discussed in module 2. Module 2 will be focused on creating and achieving goals. Mindfulness and coping with stress are also part of this module.

Language: Dutch

Supplier: The training is provided by Stammes en De Koning / Performance Consultancy. The content of the course and the information about date, location and costs can be found at the website of the training supplier (copy this link into your browser) http://www.yes-programme.nl/.

Procedures to enroll: After permission of your manager you can subscribe directly at the training supplier. Make sure that on the invoice the right cost place (475000), opco/ budget keeper and  address are mentioned (see online manual Accounting Plaza).

Title: Accelerated Learning
Description: Kurz Accelerated Learning (Train the Trainer) je určen pro každého, kdo učí ostatní s cílem, aby si osvojili nové znalosti nebo dovednosti. Je přínosný jak pro lidi, kteří se učením nebo trénováním živí tak i pro ty, kteří se do situace trenérů nebo instruktorů dostávají pouze příležitostně. Např. manažeři, pracovníci HR útvaru apod. Během tréninku porozumíte, proč schopnost dobře prezentovat (hovořit), je pouze jednou z mnoha dovedností dobrého trenéra / kouče.

Title: WinkelveiligheidScan
Description:
In this E-learning you learn what we mean with Store Safety Scan (WinkelVeiligheidScan - WVS), what we expect from Store managers and why it is important to fill in the Store Safety Scan.
Language: Dutch
Pre-requisite knowledge: general knowledge for store managers about store safety.
Duration: 10 minutes
Costs: None.
Procedures to enroll: If you want to start the E-learning at this moment, click the button "go to content". When you want to follow this E-learning later, then click the button "add to learning plan".
Keywords: store safety, safety plan, risk management, risk inventory and evaluation

Title: Ahold GAAP - Intermediate
Description:
A combination of web based and classroom training. By the end of this training participants will:
Be able to explain the Ahold Accounting Principles (consisting of IFRS & US GAAP) 
Be able to explain the impact of the Ahold Accounting Principles on HFM 
Understand the disclosure requirements and the impact in terms of deliverables for the OpCo's 
Be able to explain the impact of the Accounting Principle changes on the closing instructions 
Have used the accounting manual effectively
Content:

Classroom:

Property, Plant & Equipment 
Vendor allowances 
Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets and Commitments 
Real estate and leasing transactions 
Impairment of Assets 
Business combinations 
Income taxes
E-learning 

Leases (available as of May 27, 2005) - to be completed prior to the classroom training) 
Provisions, Contingent Liabilities and Contingent Assets (available as of May 27, 2005) - to be completed prior to the classroom training) 
Financial Reporting within Ahold 
General information on Ahold Finance organization

Description: Tijdens deze training leert de Teamleider Verkoopafhandeling hoe hij/zij een rol kan spelen in het voor de klant zo prettig mogelijk maken van het boodschappen doen bij Albert Heijn.

Deze toets is bedoeld om jou als Teamleider te toetsen op jouw kennis rondom het proces Verkoopklaar. Deze toets helpt je om ervoor te zorgen dat jij jouw medewekers in dit proces zo goed mogelijk kunt aansturen. Je slaagt voor de toets indien je 80% van de vragen goed beantwoord hebt.

Title: Fluzone High-Dose (Influenza Virus Vaccine)
Description:
In this course, you will learn about: advancing immunity with decreasing age, superior immune response versus Fluzone vaccine in older adults, the safety profile for Fluzone High-Dose vaccine, and talking points to consider when setting patient expectations before and after vaccinations.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Employee Performance: Resolving Conflict
Description:
In "Employee Performance: Resolving Conflict," you will learn the strategies and tactics necessary for effective conflict resolution. This interactive multimedia training program provides you with opportunities to address conflict with other managers, between employees, and among team members to reach agreement and achieve conflict resolution.

(2 Hours)

Title: KVALITA – QUALITY 2012, 21. Ročník konference
Description: Kvalita je již trvale nezastupitelnou součástí rozvoje naší společnosti a garantem prosperity. Uplynul zase rok a my si Vás dovolujeme pozvat na tradiční setkání našich i zahraničních odborníků, špičkových manažerů, profesionálů i odborníků kvality, pedagogů a studentů SŠ a VŠ s nabídkou jedinečné možnosti podělit se o nejnovější praktické zkušenosti a aktuální trendy podnikového řízení.

Title: Senzorické hodnocení potravin
Description: Senzorické zkoušky organoleptických a hedonických vlastností potravin, zemědělských produktů a jejich složek akreditované ČIA o.p.s. diferenční ve smyslu ISO 6658 s použitím stupnic a kategorií ve smyslu ISO 6658 analytické nebo popisné ve smyslu ISO 6658. Senzorické zkoušky jsou prováděny prostřdnictvím panelu vybraných kritérií a posuzovatelů podle ISO 5496 a ISO 8586 v senzorické laboratoři, odpovídající požadavků normy ISO 8589.

Title: Vnitřní vyšetřování
Description: Jednodenní kurz od spol. Orange Group.

Title: Coaching: Applying the Coaching Process
Description:
In Coaching: Applying the Coaching Process, you will learn how to establish coaching objectives, identify the best opportunities to coach, and communicate your goals and expectations to your employees in a clear and effective manner. You will also learn how to differentiate between performance goals and long-term goals, implement an appropriate reward system, and monitor your employees' performance.

(2 Hours)

Title: HR Mission (is possible)
Description: Účelem konference představit účastníkům doposud nevídané řešení řízení lidských zdrojů spočívají v propojení služeb a systémů tak, aby se personalisté a HR manažeři mohli zabývat již jen tvorbou strategií a finanční manažeři a ředitelé firem měli o starost(i) méně. Předmětem jednotlivých přednášek a workshopů pak bude podpora vzdělávání a rozvoje zaměstnanců, Business Proces Management, EFQM, personální a mzdové poradenství, agenturní zaměstnávání, informační systémy, sledování výkonu, outsourcing mezd, personalistiky, IT a služeb a další témata. Cílem konference je ukázat společná řešení vedoucí k efektivní práci s lidským kapitálem a zejména k úsporám nákladů na tuto oblast.

Title: Velká novela stavebního zákona na úseku Projednávání stavebních záměrů
Description:
Poslanecká sněmovna schválila velmi rozsáhlou novelu stavebního zákona, jejíž účinnost se předpokládá od 1. 1. 2013. Seminář je určen zejména pracovníkům stavebním úřadům, dotčeným orgánům, investorům, projektantům a inženýrským organizacím.

Odborný program semináře:
umisťování stavebních záměrů
povolování staveb
posuzování staveb autorizovanými inspektory
užívání staveb
odstraňování staveb
diskuse, odpovědi na dotazy účastníků

Title: Vedení obchodního jednání
Description:
Přidaná hodnota tohoto tréninku pro Vás:
Více si Osvojíte praktické techniky a dovednosti při vyjednávání.
Naučíte se, jak, kdy a proč používat konkrétní strategie při kontaktu s obchodním partnerem.
Zvládnete specifické situace během jednání.
Budete schopni vést obchodní jednání efektivně a úspěšně.
Osvojíte si nebo posílíte prvky neverbální komunikace, které Vám usnadní vedení obchodního jednání.
Naučíte se porozumět chování druhého účastníka obchodního kontaktu.

Title: Školení řidičů referentských vozidel
Description:
Požadavky na bezpečnost práce při řízení vozidel na pracovních cestách, zvláštní předpisy pro řízení na pracovních cestách, přeprava nebezpečných věcí, změny a vybraná pravidla silničního provozu, dopravní značení, zásady pro bezpečné řízení motorových vozidel, pravidla defenzivní jízdy, chyby z praxe, praktické situace na silnici.
 
Klíčová slova:
řízení vozidel, pravidla silničního provozu, firemní automobil, pracovní cesty

Title: Školení řidičů referentských vozidel
Description:
Požadavky na bezpečnost práce při řízení vozidel na pracovních cestách, zvláštní předpisy pro řízení na pracovních cestách, přeprava nebezpečných věcí, změny a vybraná pravidla silničního provozu, dopravní značení, zásady pro bezpečné řízení motorových vozidel, pravidla defenzivní jízdy, chyby z praxe, praktické situace na silnici.

Title: Klantgericht denken en commercieel sturen voor de SM
Description:
De SM is verantwoordelijk voor de commerciële resultaten. Om deze rol goed in te kunnen vullen is het noodzakelijk te denken en te handelen volgens de commerciële uitgangspunten die de organisatie heeft benoemd.

De klant centraal stellen en de medewerkers hierbij het verschil laten maken, is waar het om draait. Door de definitie van commercieel sturen te laden en deze te koppelen aan de klantwaarden, wordt de SM zich bewust van zijn invloed op de manier waarop de klant haar boodschappentrip beleeft.

Tijdens deze trainingsdag krijgt de SM inzicht in de commerciële strategie van Albert Heijn, er wordt stilgestaan bij het merk ‘Albert Heijn’ en het proces Verkoop. Natuurlijk komen ook hier de Klantwaarden weer terug. Verder wordt er aandacht besteed aan de rol van de SM ten aanzien van commercieel sturen.

De training wordt begeleid door een OM.>

Benodigde voorkennis: <Onderdeel van de voorbereidingsopdracht is het uitvoeren van een opdracht.. Houd hier bij het plannen van dit trainingsonderdeel rekening mee.

Locatie <Ahold locatie >

Title: Dit ben ik, dit kan ik
Interne Communicatie voor management
Description:
In de werkplekmodule Interne Communicatie komen de volgende onderwerpen aan de orde:
- communicatiestructuur in de winkel
- telefoonbehandeling
- werken met de handboeken
- postbehandeling (winkelweb, mail, posttas)
- prioriteiten stellen in lezen en afhandelen post/mail, etc.

Na dit onderdeel heeft de (A)SM zicht op structuur en middelen voor efficiënte en effectieve communicatie in de winkel.

Title: Welcome to DiSC
Description: This course provides an overview of the DiSC analysis.

Title: Managing IT Projects: Project Fundamentals and Initiation
Description:
In "Managing IT Projects: Project Fundamentals and Initiation," you will learn the basic concepts of Project Management and the first phase (Initiation) of a typical Project Management Process. The course covers the project context and the project life cycle. In addition, it deals with the main project participants and processes and how to select and initiate a project.

(2 Hours)

Title: Velká novela stavebního zákona na úseku územního plánování
Description:
Na semináři budou probrány všechny body novely na úseku územního plánování, důraz bude kladen zejména na aplikaci přechodných ustanovení ve vztahu k ÚPD, jejíž pořizování bylo zahájeno a do 31. 12. 2012 nebude ukončeno, kvalifikační požadavky na pořizovatele a udělování výjimek ze vzdělání, nový vztah § 18 odst. 5 k ÚPD, projednávání ÚAP s obcemi, možné sankce pro poskytovatele údajů, zveřejňování na úřední desce a počítání lhůt, posuzování vlivů jednotlivých druhů ÚPD na životní prostředí, zrušení konceptu ÚP a nové pojetí variant řešení u všech druhů ÚPD, nové pojetí vztahu mezi jednotlivými druhy ÚPD, zavedení pojmu oprávněný investor a jeho pravomoci, zkrácené pořizování aktualizací PÚR a ZÚR z důvodu veřejné dopravní a technické infrastruktury, nový postup při uplatňování připomínek a námitek včetně stanovisek dotčených orgánů k nim, uplatňování připomínek v době společného jednání, možnosti úhrady aktualizací ZÚR a změn ÚP vyvolaných PÚR, změny v pojetí předkupního práva a nové pojetí náhrad za změnu v území.
Závěr semináře bude věnován dotazům a odpovědím. Seminář je určen pořizovatelům a projektantům územně plánovací dokumentace, dotčeným orgánům a pracovníkům stavebních úřadů, kteří na základě této dokumentace vydávají rozhodnutí.

Title: Inspiration
Description:
In this 1 day training you'll be inspired on your personal effectiveness. How doe you perceive the world? How does this influence your actions and effectiveness? Expert modelling and interviews will give you new insights.

Learning objectives:
You
* get insight in personal patterns. How do you fullfil your role as CAM? How do you make contact? What are your values and beliefs? How do you influence others? 
* get inspired by more experienced CAM's. How do they influence their effectiveness? 
* get insight in how you can present yourself stronger.

Language: Dutch or English, depends on participants

Supplier: New Life University

Location: Ahold location

Costs: € 2500,-- per group. These costs will be charged to the cost center of your department.

Min-max groupsize: 8  participants - 20 participants

Title: Managing IT Projects: Project Control and Closure
Description:
In "Managing IT Projects: Project Control and Closure," This course completes the recurring course and prepares the student for the overall daily control requirements and closure of project phases, including the final completion and hand-over of the project to the client or sponsor. It covers how to control costs, ensure quality, and manage risks in a project.

(2 Hours)

Title: Etos, Coachen voor Verkoop 2015
Description:
"Het traject Alles op verkoop gaat jou en jouw winkelteam helpen om jouw plannen op gebied van verkoop te realiseren. Het traject is opgebouwd uit 5 stappen: Stap 0 is jouw winkelplan.  Deze heb je afgerond tijdens Winkelperformance. 
Stap 1 is deze voorbereidingsopdracht om focus aan te brengen om het resultaatgebied Verkoop. 
Stap 2 is een training. Deze training is er op gericht dat jij zelf een plan maakt om Alles voor Verkoop in jouw winkel te implementeren. Én in deze training krijg je tools en vaardigheden aangereikt om te coachen op verkoop in jouw winkel. 
Stap 3 volgt in de praktijk. Je gaat je team informeren over jouw plan Alles voor Verkoop. Je s

Title: Proces ročního hodnocení + Connect
Description: Toto školení je určeno pro manažery k hodnocení svých pracovníků. Cílem je získání informací o procesu ročního hodnocení, přípravě a vedení jednoročního hodnotícího pohovoru. Zároveň představení program Connect, naučit uživatele v programu pracovat.

Title: Resolving Team Conflict
Description:
In "Team Conflict: Resolving Team Conflict," you will learn how to identify, clarify, and address team conflict. You will also learn about conflict resolution styles, types of team conflict, and guidelines for resolving team conflict.

(2 Hours)

Title: Blok 7 AKWM - Commercieel Gastheerschap
Description:
Commercieel Gastheerschap is een verkoop- en klantgerichtheidstraining die aansluit op de formule en de kernwaarden van Gall & Gall. De klant wordt als uitgangspunt genomen en uw retailgevoel wordt verder versterkt.
In deze training krijgt u erkende en nieuwe commerciële inzichten en werkwijzen aangereikt die u vervolgens kunt meegeven aan uw medewerkers in de winkel. De cursus levert meetbaar rendement op, bijvoorbeeld meer aankopen per klant of een algehele omzetverbetering.

Inhoud van de training:
- Retailkwadrant - de 4 dimensies van retail
- Bedieningsportfolio
- Inzicht in eigen resultaten
- Klantgesprek
- Inzicht in klantgedrag
- Verkoopwens van klanten

Tbv de ontwikkeling van verkoopvaardigheden en vergroten klantgerichtheid afgestemd op de kernwaarden van de formule van Gall & Gall.

Bij deze training hoort een voorbereidingsopdracht.

Title: Training for Growth
Description: "Sales/Specialist Summit Workshop" Creating training plans that meet adult learner needs & identifying and practice effective presentation skills.

Title: Social hygiëne
Description:
Voldoe aan de wettelijke eis, leer over de veiligheid rondom alcohol en het verantwoord verkoop hiervan.
De cursus Sociale Hygiëne is een zelfstudiecursus met een examen. De overheid heeft bepaald dat ondernemers en andere leidinggevenden van slijterijen en horecabedrijven waar alcoholhoudende dranken verkocht worden, moeten voldoen aan de eis Sociale Hygiëne. Deze personen dienen op de Drank & Horecavergunning vermeld te staan. Tijdens de openingsuren van een slijterij of horecabedrijf moet altijd minstens één persoon aanwezig zijn die in het bezit is van de SHV-verklaring Sociale Hygiëne. In de slijterijen met ruime openingstijden moeten dus meerdere personen deze verklaring hebben. Ook de ondernemer zelf moet aan deze eis voldoen.

Inhoud van deze training: Gastvrijheid in de horeca, Sociale vaardigheden, Veiligheid in uw slijterij of horecabedrijf, Alcohol-, gok- en drugsverslaving en Inrichtingseisen en voorzieningen.Taal: Nederlands

Hulp nodig? Klik hier.

Title: Workshops
Description:
Het doel van de workshops is om u als winkelmanager in korte tijd kennis te laten opdoen over specifieke onderwerpen, zoals de Gall & Gall formule, het wijnassortiment, sollicitatietechnieken, het beoordelen van medewerkers, etc. Kennis over deze onderwerpen kan u goed van pas komen bij het uitoefenen van uw functie en bij alles wat er in en rond de winkel speelt. 

De inhoud van de training is afhankelijk van het onderwerp van de workshop.

Elke winkelmanager is verplicht om aan minimaal 2 (maximaal 4) workshops deel te nemen.

Title: Slijtersvakdiploma
Description:
Gall & Gall vindt productkennis zeer belangrijk. Het opdoen van kennis op het gebied van diverse dranken staat daarom hoog in het vaandel. Het goed kunnen adviseren van klanten is een essentieel, maar ook een leuk onderdeel van het slijtersvak. Het slijtersvakdiploma is een goede opleiding op het gebied van wijn, bier, gedistilleerd en sociale hygïëne. Na het doen van deze uitgebreide cursus en het behalen van het diploma, bent u als winkelmanager of eerste verkoper in staat om uw klanten optimaal van dienst te zijn.

Inhoud van de training:
- Het diploma Sociale Hygiëne
- Wijnbrevet (het basisdiploma Wijnbrevet)
- Gedistilleerd brevet (het basisdiploma Gedistilleerd brevet)
- Bierbrevet (het basisdiploma Bierbrevet)

U kunt de brevetten los van elkaar behalen en dus in uw eigen tempo studeren. Het Wijnbreven en het Gedistilleerdbrevet geven u het recht om u in te schrijven voor de gespecialiseerde Vinologen- en Liquoristenopleiding.

Title: Verkoopkracht
Description:
De cursus Verkoopkracht is speciaal voor Gall & Gall winkelmedewerkers ontwikkeld. Verkoopkracht is een verkoop- en klantgerichtheidstraining die aansluit op de formule en kernwaarden van Gall & Gall. De training sluit daarnaast aan op de training Commercieel Gastheerschap voor winkelmanagers. De klant wordt als uitgangspunt genomen en het retailgevoel bij winkelmedewerkers wordt verder versterkt. In deze training gaat u veel oefenen met verkoopgesprekken en leert u hoe de omzet kunt vergroten door o.a. meer bijverkoop. De cursus levert meetbaar resultaat op, door bijvoorbeeld een hoger bonbedrag of algehele omzetverhoging.

Inhoud van de training:
- Retailkwadrant - de 4 dimensies van retail
- Bedieningsportfolio
- Inzicht in eigen resultaten
- Klantgesprek
- Inzicht in klantgedrag
- Verkoopwens van klanten

Deze training draagt bij aan de ontwikkeling van verkoopvaardigheden en het vergroten van klantgerichtheid afgestemd op de kernwaarden van de formule van Gall & Gall

Title: Helping to Erode Patient Barriers to Insulin Pens
Description: Helping to Erode Patient Barriers to Insulin Pens

Title: Personeelsmanagement voor de SM
Description:
Het Management is verantwoordelijk voor het personeelsmanagement in de winkel. Beiden zorgen zij ervoor dat de organisatie van de winkel vorm krijgt vanuit het besturingsmodel. De SM werkt samen met de ASM aan een juiste kwaliteit en kwantiteit van de personele bezetting.

Deze module verduidelijkt de samenhang tussen de verschillende onderdelen van personeelsmanagement in relatie tot de strategie van Albert Heijn om te komen tot een verkoopgerichte organisatie.

Aan de orde komt:

•  elementen van Personeelsmanagement en de rol als manager van de personele organisatie;

•  formatiemanagement  in relatie tot het besturingsmodel;

•  kwantitatieve- en kwalitatieve analyse  van huidig- naar ideaal W-bestand;

• kwantitatief en kwalitatief actieplan opstellen en van daaruit handelen ‘met het doel voor ogen’;

•  begrippen in-, door- en uitstroom en welke onderdelen  ingezet kunnen worden   naar een ideaal W-bestand binnen een gegeven loonmodel;

•  talentontwikkeling.

Benodigde voorkennis: Onderdeel van de voorbereidingsopdracht is het uitvoeren van een opdracht. Houd hier bij het plannen van dit trainingsonderdeel rekening mee.

Title: E-learning DELI
Description:
Tento e-learning je součástí projektu DELI, který je strategickou prioritou naší společnosti, a je zaměřený především na znalost sortimentu a zákaznický přístup. Jeho cílem je ale také osvěžit uživatelovi základní znalosti procedur. Tím, by se z uživatele měl stát profesionál v oboru DELI, který nejen, že zná výborně technické náležitosti svojí profese, ale je rovněž schopen zákazníkovi poradit, podpořit jej v nákupu a přimět jej tak k častějšímu nákupu v prodejnách Albert. Toto vše je poté ověřeno závěrečným testem.



Délka kurz/časová náročnost: max 30 minut

Title: Bedrijfshulpverlening (BHV)
Description:
Theorie en praktijk cursus over de taken van een bedrijfshulpverlener

Inhoud van de training
- Toets over het boek ‘Bedrijfshulpverlener’
- Eerste hulp/lvensreddelnde handelingen bij diverse aandoeningen
- Communicatie en het melden van incidenten
- Beperken en bestrijden van een beginnende brand
- Taak van de bedrijfshulpverlener
- Ontruiming (ontruimingsplan, vluchtroutes, noodverlichting, etc.)

Bij deze training hoort zelfstudiemateriaal en een toets.

Title: Masterclass Wijn
Description:
Naar behoefte van de deelnemers verbreedt deze cursus de kennis op het gebied van wijn.

De masterclass Wijn is het vervolg op de Basis Wijncursus en gaat dieper in op onder meer productie- en vinificatiemethoden en verschillende wijngebieden. 
Ook de praktijk wordt niet vergeten: u zult diverse wijnen kunnen proeven en beoordelen. Na deze dag hebt u aanmerkelijk meer kennis over het product, zodat u uw klanten beter van dienst kunt zijn. Wijn is naast malt whisky een product waarbij uw advies aan de klant en grote rol speelt.

Inhoud van de training:
- Herkomst van wijn
- Wijngebieden
- Vinificatiemethoden
- Proeven van wijnen

Title: Masterclass Whisky
Description:
Naar behoefte van de deelnemers verbreedt deze cursus de kennis op het gebied van whisky.

De masterclass Whisky geeft inzicht in whisky’s van de hele wereld. De nadruk wordt gelegd op Schotse malt whisky’s. Uiteraard zult u deze dag ook whisky gaan proeven, en u gaat zelf whisky blenden. Na deze dag hebt u aanmerkelijk meer kennis over het product, zodat u uw klanten beter van dienst kunt zijn. Malt whisky is naast wijn een product waarbij uw advies aan de klant en grote rol speelt.

Inhoud van de cursus:
- Toelichting op whisky’s uit de hele wereld
- Productkennis
- Productiemethoden
- Proeven
- Blenden

Title: Verantwoorde Verkoop van Alcohol
Description:
Deze training is bedoeld voor alle winkelmedewerkers van Gall & Gall en 

Gall & Gall neemt haar maatschappelijke verantwoordelijkheid door een adequaat alcoholbeleid te voeren. 

Het doel is om de deelnemers kennis aan te bieden op het gebied van alcoholmisbruik en verslaving, alcoholgebruik op jonge leeftijd en de gevolgen hiervan, bepalingen uit de Drank- en Horecawet.

Daarnaast geven we inzicht in de gevolgen van alcoholgebruik en misbruik en leren medewerkers welke maatschappelijke rol zij zelf spelen als verkoper van alcohol. 

Ook ontwikkelen de deelnemers vaardigheden, waarna zij bewust kunnen omgaanmet jongeren welke drank willen kopen. Zijn ze in staat bij iedereen een id-check te doen en zijn ze in staat bewust iemand wel of geen alcohol te verkopen.  

Inhoud van de training:
- Kennis en feiten opdoen aan de hand van kennisquiz
- Voor- en nadelen alcoholgebruik (interactief)
- Theorie verkoop je wel of niet
- Rollenspelen

Title: Overview of the Types of Coaching Sessions
Description:
Coaching patients has become a critical component of the role of a Pharmacist.

When our customers choose our Pharmacies, they expect trust, accuracy, and to be given any information that is pertinent to their health. As Pharmacists, we have an obligation to provide accurate information to our customers, and intervene or coach whenever necessary. This course will help you:


	Identify the 3 types of coaching sessions and locate the session type on a fax alert
	Understand the unique components of the different session types and goals for each session
	Combine different session types into one program
	Understand the importance of brand kits, training and next steps

Title: Focus on… Strategy Development (in a fast changing environment)
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

This session will focus on how to draw on your environment to shape strategy and how to quickly adjust to changing market environments (strategy feedback versus strategy feed-forward. We look at the importance of strategy development at Ahold and discuss how Ahold creates a strategy. The role of financial leadership on various levels within Ahold will be a recurring theme in this session. Prof. Dr. Ir. Derkjan van der Leest

Prof. Dr. Ir. Derkjan van der Leest collaborates with Andrew Campbell and Michael Goold in research focusing on corporate management issues. In 2002 he founded the Strategic Management Centre (SMC) in the Netherlands . He provides boardroom consulting and conduct research in the area of corporate strategy, structure and governance. In 2002 he became professor of Strategic Management at the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam , where he teaches at the post academic Controllers Institute. He published several books and articles.

Title: Focus on… Value Creation and Return on Capital
Description:
Ahold’s internal training programme ‘Focus on…’ aims at keeping Ahold financial staff abreast of the latest developments and expanding their knowledge in key fields of operation.

What makes a customer the driver in value creation? How can we incorporate customer focus in our value creation management techniques and what is the role of the financial professional in discussions with commercial disciplines on value creation? On the theoretical side, we look at economic concepts used to define value creation and return on capital, turning from there to a practical focus on Ahold and how a model using these concepts could work for Ahold. Prof. Dr. Cees van Halem

Prof. Dr. Cees van Halem worked as a consultant at BSO management Support before he was appointed as financial director of a venture in the field of clinically pharmaceutical research in 1982. In 1985 he started his own company called “Oasis”, specialised in management information. In 1991, he was appointed as (part-time) professor at the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam. In 1998, Cees joined the Erasmus Universiteit as a professor management accounting & Control. At this position he was also the director of the post academic course for registered controllers. Cees published over 80 Articles in national and international professional magazines. He regularly speaks on congresses and symposia.

Title: Learning Tool Giving an instruction (ENG)
Description:
Teaching someone to carry out a task independently

Would you like to become more effective in giving an instruction, for example when someone needs to learn a new task? Would you like to know how you can prepare for giving instruction? Would you like to know what works, and what doesn't, when you give an instruction? And would you like to know how you finish an instruction? 
If you would like to know the answers to these questions, you can read this tool about giving an instruction. After a brief explanation of the goals of giving instruction, you will get an overview of the steps to take.

The method
Giving an instruction is effectively teaching someone to carry out a new task, in such a way that this person can carry out the task independently. When you give instruction, you vary in the way you give information. You prepare the instruction, you explain the steps, you demonstrate the task and you let the employee carry out the task by himself. In this learning tool you will find a form with the steps which will help you giving the instruction.

Necessary time
Approximately 10 minutes to read the learning tool

Language: English

Procedures to enroll: If you want to start the learning tool at this moment, click the button "go to content". When you want to look at this learning tool later, then click the button

Title: Dale Carnegie Course
Description:
This program is designed to help the participant achieve the significant breakthroughs they may be striving for personally and professionally.  The Dale Carnegie Course will help you map out strategies for developing leadership with key individuals and situations both on and off the job.

In short, the course will power you to move far beyond your comfort zone as you stretch for and attain ambitious new goals. 

Who Should Attend 
Employees at all levels in a corporation who seek to maximize their performance, become stronger leaders and add more value to the organization.


You Will Be Able To 

Tackle complex challenges 
Generate more and better ideas 
Excel as a consensus builder 
Communicate clearly and concisely 
Reduce self-consciousness and fear 
Apply 30 human relations principles

This course is a three-day seminar that runs on consecutive weekdays.

For more information of the course, or data and location information please go to http://www.dcbenelux.com/uk/index.html

Title: High Impact Presentations (Dale Carnegie)
Description:
Whether you are persuading colleagues, selling a client or energizing a team, the power of your presentation makes the difference between success and failure.

The experience in this seminar is as close as you can get to having a personal, public speaking coach. You present at least seven times over the course of two days. Your presentations are videotaped and evaluated. And you get expert one-on-one coaching at the end of each presentation.

Who Should Attend 
High-Impact Presentations will benefit managers who have some prior public speaking experience. It is particularly useful for executives who speak in front of groups, sales people and anyone who meets the press. This is a more advanced seminar and is not recommended for those new to public speaking. 

Learn How To 
Persuade the audience with supporting facts and examples 
Project a positive image 
Prepare for an interview 
Lead effective Q & A sessions 
Communicate ideas with clarity and force 
Be more relaxed and natural when making presentations 
Motivate and persuade every audience, every time 
Recognize individual and team success 
Format

High-Impact Presentations is a two-day seminar that runs on consecutive weekdays from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (Times may vary according to location).

For more information of the course, or data and location information please go to http://www.dcbenelux.com/uk/index.html

Title: The Complete Skilled Negotiator (GAP)
Description:
Bij iedere onderhandeling in het voordeel zijn? Wordt de beste onderhandelaar die rekening houdt met alle aspecten van de onderhandeling.

The Complete Skilled Negotiator is een ervaringsgerichte onderhandelingstraining die onderhandelingsgedrag en –vaardigheden test in verschillende situaties.
Verschillende onderhandelingstypen worden belicht, waarbij het belang van gedragsaanpassingen die aansluiten bij de gekozen onderhandelingsstrategie keer op keer wordt benadrukt.
De workshop is bijzonder praktisch, grotendeels ervaringsgericht en casusgeoriёnteerd. Doen staat centraal. Uitgebreide analyses van case-situaties met behulp van video-opnamen en praktisch toepasbare tools.
Onderhandelingstactieken komen aan de orde alsook het gebruik van macht in onderhandeling en hoe de machtsbalans kan schuiven.
De workshop gaat in op de achterliggende psychologische redenen waarom mensen zich zo ongemakkelijk voelen tijdens onderhandelingen en hoe deze gevoelens zich manifesteren naar buiten – hoe dit te voorkomen - alsook hoe men onderhandelingsgedrag kan ‘lezen’ of interpreteren bij de andere partij door ‘in hun hoofd’ te kruipen.

Voorkennis: Onderhandelingservaring
Leverancier: The Gap Partnership
Locatie: Extern
Deelnemers: 5 - 8
Trefwoorden: professioneel, trading skills, impasse, controle, conflict bedwingen

De E-Pas en Vacaturezoeker van Randstad zijn hulpmiddelen die ingezet kunnen worden bij het zoeken naar ander werk buiten Albert Heijn. E-Pas staat voor Elektronische Persoonlijke Arbeidsmarkt Scan en biedt de medewerker een realistisch beeld van de arbeidsmarkt gebaseerd op zijn of haar wensen.

Title: Advanced Importing and Exporting with Access 2010
Description: Microsoft Office Access 2010 offers several advanced options for importing and exporting data. With Access 2010 you can link to, or import data and objects from external sources, such as other Access databases, SQL Server databases, Excel spreadsheets, Microsoft Word files, and XML files. You can also export data and objects from an Access 2010 database to a variety of external sources. This course explains and demonstrates the various methods of importing, exporting, and linking to external data sources in Access 2010.

Title: Getting Started with Access 2010
Description:
Access 2010 is the newest version of Microsoft's dynamic database management tool and it offers features that allow you to create and modify a variety of database types. The ribbon is unique to Microsoft Office and stacks the many features of Access into related tabs, making it easy to quickly access the ones you need. Backstage view is a streamlined gathering of all database file-level tools, such as those used for saving, creating databases and tables, and working with external data. This course explores the fundamentals of databases and the many tools that will help you create and modify databases in Access 2010.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Basic Presentation Skills: Delivering a Presentation
Description: Excellence in presentation can be achieved when the standard of your delivery matches the quality of your content. You may have carefully planned and structured what you want to say, but if you deliver your message in a monotone while standing stiffly, you're probably not going to captivate the audience. Having diligently prepared for your presentation, you need to make sure that your delivery is engaging. You need to communicate your enthusiasm to the audience if you want them to be enthusiastic about your ideas. At the same time, you must appear composed and confident. This course describes how to make your delivery successful and memorable. It covers techniques for managing stage fright   the biggest problem most speakers have. It also explains how to set the right environment for your presentation by making the right choices about room layout and by preparing the room, including the equipment, lighting, and temperature. You'll also find out how to use your voice and body language to deliver your message clearly and effectively. Finally, the course outlines guidelines for handling audience questions   an area most speakers are also very concerned about. After all, how credible the audience finds you can be swayed by how effectively you answer the difficult questions that come up.

Title: Getting Results without Direct Authority: Reciprocity
Description:
Acquire skills to influence others to help you to complete a task and establish mutually beneficial relationships

This course describes how to develop an effective give-and-take strategy so you can influence others to get the results you need. It also covers some possible objects of trades valued by others and available for you to offer. It also discusses some of the different trading approaches you can take in different situations.

Keywords:  influence, quid pro quo

Language:  English

Provider:  Skillsoft

Title: Using E-mail and Instant Messaging Effectively
Description:
How do you ensure that the messages you are sending are effective, acceptable, and will be taken seriously?

The use of proper e-mail etiquette is the cornerstone for ensuring your message gets across quickly, appropriately, and concisely. This course covers the basic requirements for using e-mail to communicate effectively. Specifically, you will be introduced to tried-and-true guidelines for e-mailing effectively, fundamental elements every e-mail should contain, and the importance of keeping e-mails concise. The course also covers the etiquette associated with using instant messaging programs as an extension of e-mail.

Keywords:  email etiquette, instant messaging

Language:  English

Provider:  Skillsoft

Title: Influence and Persuasion
Description:
Influencing and persuading others requires careful planning. This challenge explores focused methods of verbal influence and persuasion.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Workplace Conflict: Strategies for Resolving Conflicts
Description:
Gain a practical working knowledge of how to access, analyze, and resolve conflict situations.

The more quickly and effectively you can resolve a conflict, the sooner you can get on with more productive activities in your day. Additionally, each successfully resolved conflict will lead to more confidence and knowledge about how to approach other conflicts you may face in the future. This course describes techniques you can use to deal effectively with a conflict situation. You'll learn that an important first step is to define the conflict by clarifying the issues surrounding it. You'll also find out about the importance of describing the conflict to the other party in a way that doesn't make them defensive. In addition, the course outlines collaboration skills that can help you deal with conflicts effectively, building trust and cooperation and preventing the escalation of conflict.

Keywords:  conflict, resolution, collaboration

Language:  English

Provider:  Skillsoft

Title: Basic Presentation Skills: Planning a Presentation
Description: Even the most seasoned public speakers can experience nerves before a major presentation. The successful ones, however, have learned how to make those nerves work for them. Positive concern about the impact of a presentation can spur presenters to raise their game, enabling them to get the desired results. For example, a presentation can be immeasurably improved if you devote sufficient time and attention to three key steps - analyzing your audience, organizing your ideas, and selecting an appropriate presentation method. This course describes how to plan effectively for a presentation by carrying out these steps.

Title: Planning and Preparing an Operating Budget
Description:
This course will teach you the fundamentals for planning and preparing and operating budget.

You'll learn to:


	Illustrate the benefits of budgeting
	Describe a range of commonly used budgeting methods
	Describe the process of budget preparation and control
	Illustrate how a budget is flexed to take account of actual performance and how variances are analyzed and calculated


Keywords:  budget, accounting, organization

Language:  English

Provider:  Skillsoft

Title: Recognizing and Diagnosing Problem Performance
Description: When you recognize performance problems early and diagnose them accurately, you can help turn them around and avoid serious consequences. Whether the problems lie in poor employee interactions, failure to comply with policies, or underperformance, managers need to know how to detect them in a timely manner. Performance problems can vary in scope, frequency, and magnitude. They can occur as single incidents or persistent patterns of behavior. Whatever their nature, you must intervene early, involve the employee, and uncover the true root causes in order to find the best possible solution.  This course explains how you can remain alert to early warning signs of problems in your workplace. It enables you to determine the scope and urgency of problems when they occur. And it shows you how to diagnose root causes on your way to finding the best solution.

Title: Management Essentials: Developing Your Direct Reports
Description:
A main goal of managing is developing your direct reports. This involves not only coordinating their work in a way so your organization's business objectives are met, but also empowering them and providing opportunities for them to meet their own professional development objectives. This course provides an overview of the importance and benefits of developing your direct reports as a manager, and tactical strategies for doing so. Specifically, this involves an examination of the steps required to assess the development needs of your employees by differentiating individual requirements. Also covered is the importance and methods for creating a development plan with your employees based on their individual requirements, and ways to support the development plan by creating opportunities for practice and growth in skills and abilities. Finally, this course introduces ways to continue supporting employees through follow up and monitoring, and ongoing and timely feedback. Materials designed to support blended learning activities aligned with this course are available from the Resources Page.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Introduction to Project 2010
Description: Microsoft Project 2010 includes a variety of straightforward and easily accessible features to simplify the process of managing projects, all located and organized within the Project 2010 layout. This course provides an overview of the Project 2010 interface, including the Ribbon feature, Project 2010 Backstage, and how to navigate within the Microsoft Project 2010 application.

Title: Getting Started with Word 2003
Description: To provide a basic introduction to Word 2003 and the features and tools used for creating and navigating documents in Word

Title: Google! Apps for Businesses: Working with Google Documents and Presentations"
Description:
Google Docs is another important online collaboration application in Google Apps suite. In this course, you will use Google Docs to collaborate with other users online.

This course is for any individual who will use a computer to access and utilize Google online office productivity applications.

Because Google Apps are web-based applications that are frequently and dynamically updated, there may be variations between the interface features or functions in the currently-live application versions, and the features and functions of the application version that was used to create the screen captures, job aids, and downloadable offline activities in this course.

Title: Initiating and Planning a Project
Description:
Initiating and Planning are crucial phases in developing and executing any successful project. 

Companies that are embarking on a new project initiative must assign people to gather facts and decide what exactly they want to produce and how they are going to produce it. This course examines which factors should weigh in during the project selection process and how to effectively plan a project from beginning to end.

Language:  English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Integrated Project Change Control and Close
Description: Change is inevitable. Environmental, technological, legislative, and economical changes can have an immeasurable impact on individuals and organizations. In addition to these changes, a project environment could see change requests for additional features and functions from stakeholders. As a project manager, having the ability to monitor and control the changes will mitigate project risk by considering time, cost, scope, and product quality. Controlling change will also effectively assist in closing projects or phases by ensuring approved changes are implemented and signed off by stakeholders. As a result, project managers must hold multiple perspectives and simultaneously consider the many facets of their projects. This course will equip project managers with the tools and techniques to manage project change in an integrated fashion and to close out phases and projects so that all aspects are brought to a controlled close.  The Project Integration Management knowledge area includes six processes, ranging from the creation of the project charter at the beginning of a project through to the close of a project or phase. This course covers the inputs, tools and techniques, and outputs of the fifth and sixth processes: Perform Integrated Change Control and Close Project or Phase. Through interactive learning strategies and realistic scenarios, the learner explores these concepts and gains a better understanding of the project integration processes in action.  This course is aligned with A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK� Guide) - Fourth Edition, published by the Project Management Institute (PMI�), Inc., 2008. Copyright and all rights reserved. Material from this publication has been reproduced with the permission of PMI�.

Title: Business Coaching: Conducting Coaching Sessions
Description:
An important part of any coaching session is asking the right questions. When you do this, your coachees will be more focused, attentive, and proactive in finding their own solutions. But you need to know what questions to ask, and in what order. It helps to follow a structured approach that guides you from a broad understanding of what your coachee is trying to achieve to a clear action plan with detailed steps. This course describes how to carry out effective coaching sessions, including clarifying the coachee's situation and recognizing and determining the best options for your coachee to work with. Finally, the course provides actions for wrapping up a coaching session, including getting commitment, identifying obstacles, creating a plan with deadlines, and agreeing on support going forward. Materials designed to support blended learning activities aligned with this course are available from the Resources Page.Language: English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Business Coaching: Getting Ready to Coach
Description:
In a rapidly changing business world, coaching can also help employees adjust and adapt their skill sets. 

Coaching offers organizations a win-win method for developing their employees. It not only helps individuals reach their potential but also helps the organization improve its productivity and competitiveness. Coaching is about encouraging, confronting, challenging, questioning, as well as consistently respecting and supporting coachees in developing and achieving their goals. This course introduces the skills you need to be an effective coach, including listening and observing, providing feedback, questioning, and setting goals. It also covers how to identify which coaching role is most appropriate for a given individual or situation. The course also details the importance of selling the idea of coaching to those you feel need it. 

Language:  English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Business Coaching: Using Different Coaching Styles
Description: Every coachee has different needs, and an effective coach can identify those needs and tailor a coaching style to maximize results. Coaches typically use two general coaching styles   directive and nondirective   depending on their coachee's skill and motivation, as well as how far along they are in the coaching relationship.   This course highlights the importance of using an appropriate coaching style with your coachee. Specifically, you will learn how to use different techniques for directive and nondirective coaching. Materials designed to support blended learning activities aligned with this course are available from the Resources Page.

Title: Ahold Introduction
Description:
Approx 60 minutes
Ahold Introduction
- Company Profile
- Business Strategies
- Common Values

Title: Managing Workforce Generations: Introduction to Cross-generational Employees
Description:
Managers appreciate how diversity brings value to an organization. Managed correctly, a diverse workforce, including members from different generations, enhances performance and productivity. 

The generation in which you grow up is a key influence on your adult behavior, and the different characteristics of each generation can strengthen an organization if properly managed. But stereotypes are pervasive and divert attention from the positive roles that different generations bring to the workforce. Understanding people from different generations prepares managers for the challenges of generational diversity and is a crucial first step in creating a positive work environment. This course describes the common characteristics of the four main generations in the workforce  the Traditionals, Baby Boomers, Generation X, and the Millennial Generation. It also introduces the benefits of cross-generational teams.

Keywords:  generations, diversity, positive work environment

Language:  English

Provider:  Skillsoft

Title: Managing Workforce Generations: Working with a Multigenerational Team
Description:
Understand and manage problems associated with expectations and work styles of specific generations to handle integenerational workplace issues

Tap into the potential of this diversity and view differences as strengths and you will create a more productive, collaborative, and innovative work environment. This course reviews the potential sources of conflict within a generationally diverse team, including differences in approaches to work and communication. It also covers strategies for managing a multigenerational team in a way that ensures your team members regardless of differences in approach feel included, respected, and supported. This course also describes how to implement a mentoring program that takes advantage of the varying experiences and perspectives of multiple generations.

Language:  English

Need help? Click here.

Keywords:  multigenerational, differences, generations

Title: Managing Workforce Generations: Working with the 21st-century Generation Mix
Description: Many of the same influences have shaped the lives and work experiences of the newer generations   the Millennials and the Generation Xers. Widespread Internet usage, for example, means that, typically, these generations are adept in technology. Globalization is another shaping influence, with the result that both generations value diversity. At the same time, however, each generation has its own distinct attitudes, priorities, and work habits. By using strategies that recognize the differences, managers can get the best from each generation. This course describes best practices and successful techniques for managing Millennial and Generation X employees.

Title: Generating Creative and Innovative Ideas: Maximizing Team Creativity
Description: Is creativity within everyone's grasp? Does creativity come naturally within a team, or is this a skill that some learn and others don't? Like anything, creativity and innovation can flourish when cultivated with the right tools.   This course discusses how to maximize team creativity. It explores the conditions in the work environment that help encourage team creativity, such as diversity among team members. In addition, it describes team methods for fostering creativity, including such techniques as brainstorming and role playing. Materials designed to support blended learning activities aligned with this course are available from the Resources Page.

Title: Advanced Tools for Managing Multiple Projects with Project 2010
Description: Most project managers in today's workplace are required to juggle many projects at the same time. The ability to efficiently monitor and adjust resources and task assignments is critical for the successful management of multiple projects. This course covers tools for managing multiple, related project files so that you can see the big picture relationships between your projects. Consolidating resources and task assignments allows you to prevent over-allocation or under-allocation, view cumulative resource costs across multiple projects, and integrate schedules so that dependent tasks across projects flow smoothly. This course covers the process for creating a master project that consolidates related projects into single project file, how to create and update a resource pool, and how to create a cross-project dependencies between tasks.

Title: Google! Chrome: Introduction"
Description: One of the greatest assets of computers is the Internet. In this course, you will use the Google products such as Google Chrome, Google Mail, Google Desktop, iGoogle, and Google Maps to take full advantage of all that the Internet has to offer.This course is designed for any computer professional who may be new to, or needs to learn Google for web access, office productivity, and communication.

Title: Setting and Managing Priorities within the Organization: Mission and Goals
Description:
Getting your priorities straight, no matter where you are in your organization, is about keeping a focus on your goals. 

It requires you to think about the bigger picture to ensure your department's work supports the strategic objectives of your organization as effectively as possible. This course helps you establish priorities for your group by ensuring that its goals are properly aligned with the company-wide goals and mission. It begins by clarifying the distinction between strategic, tactical, and operational goals. It then shows you how to create effective goals. Next it takes you through a step-by-step process for ensuring that the departmental goals you create are suitably aligned with the strategic objectives of the organization. This includes helping you identify imperatives for action that keep you focused and on track to meet your objectives and ensure your team is working effectively through properly identified priorities.

Language:  English

Need help? Click here.

Title: Estimating Activity Resources and Durations
Description: Resources, such as people, materials, equipment, facilities, money, or a combination of any of these, are fundamental in executing a project, and are required throughout the entire project lifecycle. Determining resource requirements is critical to successful project time management. The ability to estimate the duration of each project activity is equally essential. It is not enough to know what needs to be done and what resources are required. A project manager must know how much time it will take to complete each activity.  This course covers estimating activity resources and durations in the project management discipline, and introduces best practices outlined in A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK� Guide) - Fourth Edition, published by the Project Management Institute (PMI�). Specifically, learners will be provided with an overview of establishing resource requirements, sources of activity duration information, and methods of estimating activity durations. Some of the duration estimating techniques taught in this course include analogous estimating, parametric estimating, and using three-point estimates. This course provides a foundational knowledge base reflecting the most up-to-date project management information so learners can effectively put principles to work in their own organizations. This course will assist in preparing the learner for the PMBOK� Guide certification exam.  This course is aligned with the PMBOK� Guide - Fourth Edition, published by PMI�, Inc., 2008. Copyright and all rights reserved. Material from this publication has been reproduced with the permission of PMI�.

Title: Developing and Controlling the Project Schedule
Description: The project schedule is critical to project management. It determines the planned start and finish dates for project activities and milestones. It also confirms which activities are dependent on others, therefore enabling the project manager to prioritize the order in which activities are completed. Developing the project schedule is an ongoing process throughout the project lifecycle, as there are many factors that can either accelerate or delay deliverables in a project. It is essential in successful project management to be able to quickly identify possible impacts, evaluate the effect on all project activities, and adjust the project activities as required to minimize risk.   This course covers developing and controlling the project schedule in the project management discipline, and introduces best practices outlined in A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK� Guide)   Fourth Edition, published by the Project Management Institute (PMI�). Specifically, learners will learn how to analyze activity sequences, durations, and resource and schedule constraints, to create the project schedule. Learners will also calculate the critical path using a forward and backward pass, calculate the float, and calculate the critical chain in order to monitor progress and make changes to the project schedule as required. This course provides a foundational knowledge base reflecting the most up-to-date project management information. It will enable learners to effectively put principles to work in their own organizations, and assist in preparing them for the PMBOK� Guide certification exam.  This course is aligned with the PMBOK� Guide   Fourth Edition, published by PMI�, Inc., 2008. Copyright and all rights reserved. Material from this publication has been reproduced with the permission of PMI�.

Title: Managing Projects within Organizations
Description: Project-based operations have become the norm in today's business world. In essence, almost every work effort is a project, from constructing a new building to designing and delivering a new information management system. As projects become the primary method for getting things done and effecting organizational change, it is crucial to choose a good and proven method for managing projects. However, projects cannot be properly managed in a silo. Every aspect of project management is affected by the organization, the social environment, the project's stakeholders, both internal and external, and many other aspects of the context in which the project is carried out. Understanding this context is critical to good planning and good decision making as the project progresses toward achieving its objectives.   This course provides an overview of the project management discipline as outlined in A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK� Guide) - Fourth Edition published by the Project Management Institute (PMI�). Specifically, it introduces the characteristics of a project, the responsibilities that accompany project management, and the differences between portfolios, programs, and projects. The course will identify key project management concepts and terms, explore the PMBOK� Knowledge Areas, and provide information about the variables that can influence project outcomes. It will also cover the project stakeholders and the organizational influences on a project. This course provides a foundational knowledge base reflecting the most up-to-date project management information so learners can effectively put principles to work at their own organizations. This course will assist in preparing the learner for the PMBOK� certification exam.  This course is aligned with the PMBOK� Guide - Fourth Edition, published by PMI�, Inc., 2008. Copyright and all rights reserved. Material from this publication has been reproduced with the permission of PMI�.

Title: Opleidingstraject Etos Winkelmanager
Description: In de functie van Winkelmanager speel je een sleutelrol in het succes van Etos. Als Winkelmanager ben jij een belangrijke energiebron van de winkel. Je inspireert je teamleden. Je zorgt voor "zelfstartende"  mensen. Door jou manier van leidinggeven straalt iedereen het goede uit: plezier, enthousiasme en vriendelijkheid.  In het opleidingstraject ga je veel nieuwe kennis opdoen. Je gaat leren, trainen en oefenen. Zo ontwikkel je de competenties die een goede Winkelmanager nodig heeft. En het leuke is: daarbij verlies je de winkel en de werkpraktijk geen moment uit het oog. Want de dagelijkse praktijk staat centraal in de opleiding.  De trainingen ondersteunen de praktijk, en je persoonlijke vragen uit de praktijk kan je altijd meenemen naar de trainingen. Het ervaren en bewust worden van je eigen handelen is steeds de kern. Het opleidingstraject bestaat uit een reeks van trainingen die als één geheel georganiseerd zijn. En bestaat uit de trainingen; startbijeenkomst, communicatie, Winkelperformance en Personeelsmanagement 1, ATL 1, Winkelperformance en Personeelsmanagement 2, In je kracht, Personeelsgesprekken,  ATL 2 en Winkelperformance 3. Je volgt deze trainingen steeds in dezelfde groep deelnemers. Centraal staan: de ontwikkeling op competenties, de uitvoering in de praktijk en het maken van het winkelplan.

Title: Advanced AIM Training
Description:
Advanced training is for IM individuals that have been identified from their managers as needing a more in depth training class focusing on the specific processes defined for each project life cycle phase. Typically participants include those involved in the initiating phase (IM Lead, IM Contact, people who assist in the business case development) and those individuals who play the Project Manager role. The Basic training class is a prerequisite to attending the Advanced training class.
•	AIM Release 1 Advanced Training - Initiating Phase
o	The Initiating phase of the Ahold project lifecycle consists of those processes performed to define a new project or a new phase of an existing project by obtaining authorization to start the project or phase.  It is within this process that all the steps needed to gain approval for a project are undertaken. 
•	AIM Release 1 Advanced Training - Planning Phase
o	The planning phase consists of activities required to establish the total scope of the effort, to define and refine the objectives, and to develop the course of action required to attain those objectives. During this phase, the Project Management Plan and all subsidiary documents are created and approved. A project’s success is largely determined by the quality of the Project Management Plan; therefore, it is criticall
